description.zh: 本課程之設計係針對非歷史系學生研習之用，基本上著重以宏觀的角度作歷史趨勢的闡述。課程方面包括中、西歷史觀念的比較與中國歷代政治、經濟、社會、文化的歷史演進，藉以幫助學生認識時代之趨勢與意義。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內，能對中國歷史有一簡要而清晰的了解，並對日後的生活有所裨益。
description.en: This course is designed for non-history majors. It is chiefly intended to interpret the development of the Chinese history in a comprehensive perspective so that students may have a better understanding of the historical trends and their implications and may thus benefit from such an understanding. The course includes the following topics: a comparison of Chinese and Western concepts of history, the political, economic, social, and cultural developments of the Chinese history. The class activities include lectures and discussions; students are also required to submit written reports.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014。熱力學的概念與第一、第二定律、熵在統計學上的解釋、熱力關係式、熱容量、焓、熵及第三定律、單成份系統相平衡、氣體的行為、氣體反應與平衡常數、純凝相與氣相之平衡、溶液的行為、二元系統與二元相圖、溶液熱力學。
description.en: The first and second law of Thermodynamics, the behavior of gas, Reactions involving gases and pure condensed phase as well as gaseous phase, the behavior of solutions, Free energy-composition and phase diagrams of binary systems, Reactions equilibrium in systems in condensed solution, Electrochemistry.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。金屬表面電鍍、陽極處裡、熱浸塗覆與擴散塗覆、金屬熔射、化成塗覆、氣相化學層積、離子鍍及離子注入、合板包覆、磷酸鹽塗覆、搪瓷、表面性質測試。
description.en: The technology of Surface Treatment can be classified as follows:1.The fundamental of Electroplating theory and experiments.2.Physical processes and experiments.3.Chemical processes.4.Low temperature plasma techniques.5.Thermal spraying processes.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。以數個實例說明生產製造的方法，從一個新產品開發到設計安排及製作生產設備，一系之過程解決方法，讓同學了解一個產品的開發、製程的安排生產設備的改善、及其他相關事務的配合等問題。以達到同學到工廠能有系統的解決生產製造問題。
description.en: Required courses before taking this course must be permitted by the professor who teaches this course. There will be examples to illustrate and describe the production methods. Starting from the development of a new product, the course will introduce all process and solution ways of design , manufacture and production, so that the students are able to understand the development of products and their arrangement of manufacture and production equipment. It is our expectation that all graduated students who have taken this course are able to handle the related techniques in industries.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。變分微積分與最佳化之關係及其在工程最佳化上之應用、端點條件、不連續最佳化程序、無限制及有限制條件最佳化問題、直接法及實際最佳化設計應用等。
description.en: Introduction of Variational Calculus and its Application in the Engineering Optimal Design, Constrained/Unconstrained Optimal Design Problems, Discrete Optimal Control and Mathematical Programming, Practical Examples of Optimum Design.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。視覺檢測的基本原理、視覺系統原理各元件之作用原理、規格、限制等、影像處理技術（包括影像轉換、影像復原、影像強化、影像分割）、非接觸性尺寸量測、模式辨認（自動邊境偵測：表面積、孔數、週長及重心、方向特徵等）、影像壓縮與傳送、電腦的影像傳送、個案研究。
description.en: Basic Principle of Vision Inspection, Hardware Components of Vision System, Image Processing (Image Transform, Image Restoration, Image Enhancement, Image Segmentation), Non-Contact Dimension Measurement, Pattern Recognition (Automatic Edge Detection: Surface Area, Number of Holes, Perimeter, Centroid, Directional characteristic etc.) Image Compression and Transmission, and Case Study.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。變分法（ Weighted Residual法、Rayleih-Ritz 法等）、一維、二維及三維常用有限元素模型推演、介紹、元素內插(Interpolation)、積分、元素及總體矩陣、收歛及誤差、特徵值等、有限元素法於工程上之應用 (線性固態及結構問題為例)、商用軟體介紹。
description.en: Weighted Residual Method, Rayleigh-Ritz Method, Constant Strain Elements, Plane Strain and Stress Elemental and Global Matrix Formation, Convergence and Error, Eigenvalue Problems, Application to Engineering (Solid Mechanics and Structural Systems), and Commercial Packages.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體材料、二極體、電晶體的原理、邏輯IC、記憶體IC。如物理沈積(PVD)、化學沈積(CVD)、高溫處理、微影、蝕刻及其相關設備介紹、廠物、維修、管理及工安等。IC封裝及測試。
description.en: Introduction to semiconductor material, diode, transistor, logic IC and memory IC, etc. description of the operation principles technology and related facilities about semiconductor fabrication processes, such as Physical vapor deposition (PVD), chemical vapor deposition (CVD), doping , oxidation , heat process, lithography , and etching etc., discussion of utilities, maintenance, management and industrial safety in the factory. Discussion of IC packaging and testing.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 本課程旨在加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以分組討論、段落寫作與短文習作。
description.en: This course aims at providing the students with various reading strategies so that they may find the optimal straategies when they read independently; and furnishing the students with competence in writing.  Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world.  Students will be required to join class activites, which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 藉由歷代人物之表現形式，歸納出現代人可資取法之原則，以做為個人行事立身處事之參考。將歷代不同類型之人物，分成五個專題，由五位老師分別輪流至各班講授。
description.en: This course aims at providing a guide to role models for the people today from literary images in the history of Chinese Literature.   Five topics will be formed subject to their types and presented by five teachers in sequential periods.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002011或負責教授同意。特徵值、特徵向量及特徵函數，向量分析、向量微積分、傅立葉級數與邊界值問題、偏微分方程、複變函數。
description.en: Eigenvalue and Eigenfunction Problems, Vector Analyses, Calculus of Vectors, Fourier Series, Boundary Value Problems, Partial Differential Equations, Complex Analyses.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意量測工程概論、精密量測，力、轉矩及壓力量測，位移、速度及加速度量測，溫度、流量量測，磁場與電流量測、信號處理等。
description.en: Introduction to measurement engineering, precision measurement, force, torque and pressure measurement, displacement, velocity and acceleration measurement, temperature and flow rate measurement, magnetic field and electric current measurement, signal processing, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。自動控制數學基礎、物理系統的數學模式、控制器的種類、時域分析、穩定性分析、根軌跡法、頻率領域的分析、控制系統的設計、Z 轉換、數位控制、電腦控制之介面及程式、現代控制理論與簡介。
description.en: Mathematical Foundation of Automatic Control, Mathematical Model of Physical System, Controller Type, Time-Domain Analysis, Stability Analysis, Root Locus Method, Frequency-Domain Analysis, Design of Control System, Z-Transform, Digital Control, Interface and Programming of Computer Control, Theory and Introduction of Modern Control.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001052或負責教授同意。介紹 2D/3D CAD概論、實體模型系統、特徵式設計系統、曲面模型系統、CAD或CAE系統示範與實作。
description.en: Introduction of CAD software packages, Review of Numerical techniques for CAD.2-D Graphics, 3-D Graphics, and surface modeling, solid modeling. Design optimization, Integrated CAD systems and Animation project.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。切削加工概論、影響切削之因素、切削力學、切削熱影響、刀具材料、刀具磨耗與壽命、切屑控制、切削動態分析、切削經濟學、切削液及表面粗度、切削新技術簡介。
description.en: Introduction to Machining Technology, Parameters Affecting Metal Machining, Mechanics of Metal Machining, The Temperature Induced by Metal Machining, Tool Material, Tool Wear and Life, Chip Control, The Dynamic Control, The Economics of Metal Machining, The Fluids and Surface Roughness, Introduction to New Technology.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002010或負責教授同意。晶體結構、鋼之變態、相平衡原理、退火與正常化、淬火與回火、表面硬化處理、構造用鋼、工具鋼、其它鋼料及鑄鐵之熱處理。
description.en: The contents of this course can be categorized as followings:1.fundamental metallographic concepts.2.The effects of alloying elements in steel.3.Hardenability 4.General heat treatment process: annealing, hardening ,tempering ,and normalizing.5.Special heat treatment processes: tool steels hardening and tempering .Quenching and tempering of constructional steels, case hardening, nitriding, carbonitriding, induction hardening, and flame hardening.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。燃料及燃燒、基本熱傳理論、蒸汽動力廠、壓縮機、燃氣輪機、內燃機、汽油引擎、柴油引擎、冷凍空調循環。
description.en: Fuels and Combustion, Principles of Heat Transfer, Steam Power Plants Compressors, Gas Turbines, Internal Combustion Engines: Gasoline Engines, Diesel Engines, Refrigeration And Air Conditioning.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。導論（含系統概論、資料表示法）、微電腦結構－中央處理單元、組合語言－指令型定址法、模組化程式、位元組和字串處裡、I/O 程式、DOS 功能常式、多元程式規劃、系統匯流排結構、I/O 介面、半導體記憶、多元處裡器組態。
description.en: Introduction (Overview of Microprocessor System, Data Representation), Microprocessor Architecture-CPU etc., Assembler Language-Instruction Format, Addressing Modes, Modular Programming, Byte and String Manipulation, I/O Programming, DOS Function Multiprogramming, SystemBus Structure, I/O Interface, Semiconductor Memory, Multiprocessor Configurations.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002016或負責教授同意。流體機械總論，輪機機械之歐拉理論總升程、設計原理、相似定律及比速率，水輪機及各種泵之升程、功率、效率及損失，泵原動機功率設計、特性曲線、孔蝕現像、水鎚作用、軸之平衡。空氣機械、流體聯結器與扭拒變速器、油壓及氣力機具。
description.en: Introduction and Classification of Fluid Machines, Turbomachinery Analysis (Including the Angular MomentumPrinciple, Euler's Turbomachine Equation, Velocity Polygon Analysis), Performance Analysis and Specific Speed, Similarity Rules, Cavitation and Net Positive Suction Head (NPSH), Introduction to Water Turbine, Introduction to Pumps, Introduction to Air Machinery, Introduction to Fluid Coupling and Fluid Torque Converter, Introduction to Oil Hydraulic and Pneumatic Machinery or Equipments.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002015或負責教授同意。認識標準與規範、規範的應用、軸承設計實務、密封裝置設計、移位齒輪、潤滑設計實務、旋轉機件的慣性及啟動問題、驅動元件之選用。
description.en: Introduction to Standards and Codes, Practice of Bearing Selection, Seal Design, Shifted Gears, Practice of Lubrication Design, Mass Moment of Inertia and flywheel effects, and Driving Device Selection.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件簡介、電晶體開關電路、數位積體電路及應用、矽控整流子（SCR）、矽控整流子觸發電路、雙向矽控整流器、運算放大器及應用感測器及應用、電動機驅動電路、變頻器電路。
description.en: Semiconductor Components, Transistor Switch Circuits, Digital ICs and Application, Silicon-Controlled-Rectifier (SCR), Trigger Circuits for SCR, Triac, Operational Amplifier and Application, Sensor and Application, Drivers for Electrical Machines, and Inverters.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。品質管制之基本觀念、應用統計與機率來推定及控制產品品質、管制圖、抽樣原理、品質成本、品管系統設計及系統績效之評估。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts of Quality Control, Use Statistics and Probability to Infer and Control Products Quality, Control Chart Principle of Sampling Quality Cost Q.C System Design and Performance Estimate.

description.zh: (1)作業系統簡介 (2)工作觀念之介紹：異步及平行程式處理(3)記憶體管理：實際及虛擬記憶體之管理 (4)處理機管理：工作排序及多元處理 (5)輔助儲存體之管理：磁碟排序，檔案及資料庫 (6)網路作業系統及安全性(含分散式資料處理)(7)範例研究：DOS，UNIX Windows NT。
description.en: 1.History and evolution 2.Process concepts3.ASynchronous concurrent processes4.Desdlock and indefinite postponrmrnt5.Real storage management6.Virtual storage organization and management 7.Processor scheduling 8.Disk mansgement9.Network and security

description.zh: 能源概論，熱力學，非再生能源，再生能源的利用，能源的有效變換，未來能源的發展形態，有效能源之解析與評估，能源效率之管理。
description.en: General introduction, thermodynamics, non-renewable energy, use of renewable energy, energy conversion, future development, evaluation and analysis of energy effectiveness, energy effectiveness, energy management.

description.zh: 就基本光學及人體工學之視覺基本理論及測試方法，以確立照明之質與量的標準，先就現有燈泡、燈管、燈具作整體性之介紹並就其特性比較，從而建立選擇之標準，不僅要求光的亮度，並且綜合考慮光的品質，燈具的安全性，經濟效益、能源的節約及燈具設計，針對亮度的計算，介紹三種不同的計算方法，以供設計使用，綜合前述之重點，就商業、工業、戶外及特性照明等設計，逐一以實例說明，並兼述燈具之控制線路及有關法令。
description.en: Course Title:Design of LightingDescription:This course is designed for one-semester program in thelighting. The main purpose of this course is to introduce thesoftwares and hardwares of lighting. (including lighting equipements.lighting design, transmission system. and distribution system) and howto maintain these equipments.

description.zh: 本課程之設計係針對非歷史系學生研習之用，基本上著重以宏觀的角度作歷史趨勢的闡述。課程方面包括中、西歷史觀念的比較與中國歷代政治、經濟、社會、文化的歷史演進，藉以幫助學生認識時代之趨勢與意義。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內，能對中國歷史有一簡要而清晰的了解，並對日後的生活有所裨益。

description.zh: 在二十世紀眾多分歧的思想中，有些廣受人們的認同，並信奉為價值體系而實踐，此稱為思潮。這些流行的思潮，影響人民生活，社會生計，更影響著國家的發展方向。因此，這些思潮與國家發展有極為密切的關係。思潮的內容及其與國家發展的關係就是本課程的主要內容。當代思潮中，民族主義、國家主義與世界主義的理想不同，國家之運作便不相同；民主主義、共產主義影響各國的政治制度及人民的生活方式；資本主義、社會主義與共產主義關係著國計民生，在經濟、社會及生活各層面都深受其影響。本課程中第一部分介紹最具代表性的當代思潮，第二部份就民族思潮、經濟思潮與國家發展的關係加以剖析，藉以探討我國立國的精神所在，即民族平等、政治民主，經濟發展，以實現三民主義自由、民主、均富理想。
description.en: In the 21th century, there are numerous different thoughts in which some are well recognized, treasured and put in practice. These popular thoughts influence the livelihood, the society and the direction of national development. So contemporary thoughts plays an important role in national development. Such contemporary thoughts and national development are the key contents of this course.The ideal of such thoughts as Racism, Nationalism, and Cosmopolitanism differ from each other, so they have a different effect on national policy decision. Nationalism and Communism influence the political system of the nation and the lifestyle of its citizens. Capitalism, Socialism and Communism have a main impact on the social and economical issues and affect the quality of life of a nation. The first part of this course introduces the most representative contemporary thoughts. The second part analyzes the effect of national thoughts, political thoughts and economical thoughts on a nation.

Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world.  Students will be required to join class activites, which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程介紹用於解析實際工程問題所需之相關數學方法 , 其內容包含:(1)線性代數 (2)向量微積分 (3)傅立葉分析 (4)偏微分方程
description.en: His course introduces students of engineering to those areas of mathematics which are important in connection with practical engineering problems. The material in this course is arrange accordingly in four parts: (1) Linear algebra. (2) vector differential and integral calculus.(3)Fourier analysis.(4)Partial differential equation.

description.zh: 本實習課程設計,讓學生經由儀器及裝置的操作印證理論,內容包含物理化學.聚合物合成,高分子物性檢測,環工檢測技術,生化發酵技術,表面化學技!,乳化技,電化學技術以及有機物合成與分析技術等.
description.en: This laboratory course is designated to acquaint the student with the experiment methods of practical instrument and apparatus. It contains the following topics: physical chemistry, polymerization techniques, analytical methods in environmental science, biochemical methods in fermentation, surface chemistry, emulsification techniques, electrochemistry, and organic syntheses.

description.zh: 本課程之內容包括:化學動力學及反應機構之基本理論,動力學數據之處理,各式理想反應器之設計,非理想狀態反應器之討論,單獨觸媒中非均勻相反應器之討論.
description.en: The subjects of the course include 1) fundamental theories of chemical kinetics and reaction mechanisms, 2) kinetic data collection and manipulation, 3) design equations for ideal reactors, 4) discussions on nonideal reactors, and 5) nonhomogeneous catalytic reactions.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括控制閥、控制器之介紹，程序動態應答分析，閉還路控制系統分析，控制器調諧，頻率應答分析及串級控制系統之介紹
description.en: This course contents the introduction of control valve and controller, process dynamics, close loop control system, tuning of feedback controller, frequency response techniques, and cascade control system.

description.zh: 本課程介紹利用質量、能量守恆定律(熱力學第一定律)及均衡方程式(熱力學第二定律)，並在導入逸壓（Fugacity）觀念下，討論單成份系相平衡問題。最後延伸至多成份系統的熱力學性質的探討。此外還介紹化工程序中真實流體流動熱力學、機械能均衡、熱力學機械之設計與作功原理、熱機循環之熱力函數及熱機效率。
description.en: This course is designed as an introductory course in thermodynamics of chemical engineering.  Topics include the first and second law of thermodynamics, open and closed system, thermodynamics properties of materials, generalied correlations with real fluids and multicomponent systems.  Emphasis is placed on the chemical potential and its use in phase equilibria and chemical reaction equilibria.

description.zh: 此內容為化工程序的理論基礎，探討熱量與質量輸送之現象，以便應用於化工單元操作以及反應工程有關之計算與設計。
description.en: The course introduces the principles of the chemical process and discusses the heat and mass transport phenomena. And its application to the chemical unit operation and reaction engineering.

description.zh: 電鍍工程是特別設計之金屬,塑膠與陶瓷等表面處理之濕鍍工程技術課程,其內容包括基礎電化學,鍍件之前處理與後處理.一般之單元金屬電鍍,合金電鍍,複合電鍍,鋁陽極處理,金屬,塑膠與陶瓷上之化學鍍.電鍍工程,環保廢水處理及公害防止,程序管理與品質控制,哈路槽試驗,添加物與光澤劑等.
description.en: Electroplating engineering is a course of specially designed wet processes for surface finishing of metals, plastics and ceramics substrate. It consist of basic electrochemistry, pretreatment and after treatment for plating, commercial plating. Anodizing of aluminum, chemical plating on metals, plastics and ceramics, plating engineering, environmental waste treatment, process and quality control, Hull cell testing, additives and brightened

description.zh: 本課程之目標在(一)使學生瞭解重要化學品之合成原理與工業上的合成程序；(二)使學生瞭解合成反應與反應機購及工業合成程序的應用。內容包括基本合成原理，有機合成反應，無機合成反應，重要化學品之合成與利用。
description.en: Studies of syntheric principles of chemical and synthetic processes of industry. Chenmical reaction of synthesis, mechanism of chemical reaction, application of processes of industrial synthesis also included.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。

All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 在二十世紀眾多分歧的思想中，有些廣受人們的認同，並信奉為價值體系而實踐，此稱為思潮。這些流行的思潮，影響人民生活，社會生計，更影響著國家的發展方向。因此，這些思潮與國家發展有極為密切的關係。思潮的內容及其與國家發展的關係就是本課程的主要內容。當代思潮中，民族主義、國家主義與世界主義的理想不同，國家之運作便不相同；民主主義、共產主義影響各國的政治制度及人民的生活方式；資本主義、社會主義與共產主義關係著國計民生，在經濟、社會及生活各層面都深受其影響。本課程中第一部分介紹最具代表性的當代思潮，第二部份就民族思潮、經濟思潮與國家發展的關係加以剖析，藉以探討我國立國的精神所在，即民族平等、政治民主，經濟發展，以實現三民主義自由、民主、均富理想。
description.en: In the 21th century, there are numerous different thoughts in which some are well recognized, treasured and put in practice. These popular thoughts influence the livelihood, the society and the direction of national development. So contemporary thoughts plays an important role in national development. Such contemporary thoughts and national development are the key contents of this course.The ideal of such thoughts as Racism, Nationalism, and Cosmopolitanism differ from each other, so they have a different effect on national policy decision. Nationalism and Communism influence the political system of the nation and the lifestyle of its citizens. Capitalism, Socialism and Communism have a main impact on the social and economical issues and affect the quality of life of a nation. The first part of this course introduces the most representative contemporary thoughts. The second part analyzes the effect of national thoughts, political thoughts and economical thoughts on a nation.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括礦產品經濟分析、礦床蘊藏量計算、採礦方法評選、炸藥之化學成份設計、剝土比及露天開採界限之計算、露天開採爆破設計、邊坡穩定設計、物料搬運機械選擇、物料搬運機械之成本分析、現場實習、捲揚系統設計、回收率之計算、排水設計、鑽進機械之選擇及成本估算、地下開採爆破設計、通風設計、開採成本及利用之計算等。
description.en: This class includes mineral economic analysis, reserve evaluation, mining method selection, break-even analysis, surface blasting design, material handling and machines, hoisting design, recovery calculation, mine power and drainage and overall mining cost analysis.

description.zh: 為配合課程使學生有實際操作的經驗以獲得完整的知識，實習課程包括：篩析法、碎礦實習、磨機實習、自由沈降實習、安氏吸管粒度測定、重液選礦、濃集實習、薄水層選礦、靜電選礦、磁選、浮選、脫水及乾燥等實習項目。
description.en: The laboratory section of the mineral processing classes are designed to have student obtain hand-on experiences of various mineral processing operations.  The lab. includes screening, crushing, grinding operation, settling, size analysis, heavy medium separation, classification, sluicing, electrostatic and magnetic separations, flotation, dewatering and drying.

description.zh: 本課程針對各種資源之特性，使學生瞭解開發各類資源之方法及各種機器之應用。其內容包括：資源探勘、資源蘊藏量評估、資源開拓、資源開採、地下開採、地面開採、大型機器之應用及特殊工程施工。
description.en: Various mining exploitation methods and mining equipmentinvolved are introduced in this class.  It includes exploration, reserve calculation, resource exploitation, and mining operations (underground and surface).

description.zh: 資源處理的主要對象為礦物，但其他有些固體與固體間或固體與液體間之分離與純化也包括在本工程之內，採用的方法：凡是各分離物間不同之物理及化學性質，皆可設法加以利用。本課程則針對其應用方法加以介紹，以期學生對資源處理有一初步及完整的認識。授課內容包括：粉粒體之簡介、篩及篩分、碎礦機之種類及應用、磨礦機之種類及應用、分級及分級機、重液選礦、浮游選礦、磁選機之種類及應用等。
description.en: Mineral processing uses various techniques to perform solid-solid and soild-liguid separation and concentration by using physical and chemical properties between different minerals.  The separation and concentration methods include particle size analysis, screening, crushing, grinding, pulverizing, classification, heavy medium separation, flotation, magnetic separation, etc.

description.zh: 本課程以訓練學生對陶瓷材料性質認識，並進而介紹陶瓷材料基本製程。課程重點在陶瓷粉体製備成形方法，燒結及燒結理論，除加強學生認識傳統陶瓷外，並對結構陶瓷與電子陶瓷之應用，作有系統的介紹。
description.en: This course is aimed at training student in knowing ceramics materials, and furtherintroduce the fundamental manufacturing process of ceramics materials. It focuson the preparation method, roast-sintering and its theory of ceramics pulverulentbody. Apart from strengthening the knowledge of traditional ceramics, it alsohas a systematic introduction to the structural ceramics and electronic ceramicsapplication.

description.zh: 提煉冶金學係講授各種金屬之提煉方法，內容包括礦石及各種原料之預備處理，火法冶煉─包括冶煉之化學原理，火法精煉、熔劑、爐渣、冰渣（matte） 、黃渣（speiss）等；濕法冶煉─包括溶濾、固液分離、淨液及金屬之採取等；電化冶煉─包括電解製煉之原理、電解精煉、電解採取及熔融鹽電解等；最後講述各種主要金屬之提煉方法。
description.en: Extractive metallurgy lectures each kind of means to extrate metals.The course contents include:1. Preparing treatment of minerals and all kinds of raw material,2. Dry smelting, includingthe chemical theory of smelting, dry refining, flux, slag,          matte, speiss, etc..3.Wet process smelting, including solution filtering, the separation of solid and liquid,  pure liquid, and the extraction of metal, etc..4.Electrochemical smelting, including the theory of electrowinning, electrolytic  refining, electrolytic extraction and molten salt electrolysis.5.All kinds of extractive means of the major metals.

description.zh: 使學生認識陶瓷製造的基本過程及測試陶瓷基本性質，包括陶瓷材料之物理，機械，及電導性質。除配合國內產業結構外，本實習課程將另介紹對新陶瓷的製程技術概念。
description.en: Let students understand the basic process of ceramics manufacturing and the fundamental property of testing ceramics, including the physical, mechanical andelectricity conductivity property of ceramics material. Except for matching thedomestic industry development structure, this laboratory course shall introducethe new manufacturing technique concept of new ceramics.

description.zh: 「電化冶金」乃是一門探討如何利用電化學原理從事冶金工作之研究，任何電化學反應之進行都必須有陽極、陰極、電解液（質）之存在方能發生，缺一不可，了解陽極之氧化反應，陰極之還原反應，陰陽極各界面之行為，與電解質之導電度行為，實為進入電化學領域之不二法門，再以電化學方面之知識基礎，應用在金屬之濕法冶鍊，金屬之防蝕等材料工程上，期能精鍊更高純度之金屬，保固金屬並延長使用壽命。本課程包括：介紹一連串電化學理論為基礎，從而由淺入深地應用到冶金及材料科學上以期使學生學習到實際的電化學應用、實務與理論配合。學生須先具備分析化學及物理化學的知識。由表面性質的決定，談到界面電化學，及界面電荷傳導，及分佈的電性質理論，來決定溶液中化學反應發生的模式.
description.en: Electrochemical metallurgy is a course to study how to utilize electrochemistry todo the research of metallurgy, any electrochemical reaction should be done at theexistence of anode, cathode and electrolyte, therefore, to understand the oxidation reaction of anode, the reduction reaction of cathode, their interface behaviors,and the conductivity behavior of electrolyte, are the only way to enter electrochemical`territory. Further, using the basic knowledge of electrochemistry to apply at the wet process smelting and anticorrosion of metal, in order to expect a higher degree ofpurity, protection and longetivity. From introduction to a series of fundamental electrochemical theory to applying metallurgy and material science step by step,the course let students learn practically applied electrochemistry,matching practice with theory.Students should be owning the knowledgeof analytical chemistry and physic chemistry.They shall determine the surface property, surface electrochemist

description.zh: 1. 高分子材料結構及其物理性質2. 高分子定性與分析3. 高分子流變學4. 高分子複合材料
description.en: 1. Polymeric structure and its properties 2. Characterization and analysis of polymers3. Rheoology of polymers4. Polymers composite materials

description.zh: 本課程包含1.複合材料的基礎知識：如複合材質及複合過程，複合構造及組織、複合材料的力學性質等基本知識。2.各種複合材料的 介紹，如炭素纖維強化複合材料金屬等複合材料等，原理及應用之 介紹。3.對於尖端技術領域之應用。複合材料大致可區分為高分子 基複材，金屬基複材，陶瓷基複材及纖維複材四種。纖維複材中， 可依強度，韌性和成本需求而選用玻璃纖維、硼纖維、碳纖維、有 機纖維、陶瓷纖維、金屬纖維等作為強化元件。上述各種複材製造 方法，介面結構，機械性質，應用，微觀力學、巨觀力學、強度、 破裂、疲勞和設計均為討論內容。
description.en: The course includes the following items: 1.The basic knowledge of composite materials such as composite materials, composite process and composite structure and tissue, the dynamics property of composite materials. 2.The introduction of all kinds of composite materials, such as the principle and application of reinforced composite material of carbon-fiber. 3.The application of composite materials at the most advanced area.The composite materials approximately can be classified into polymer base composite material, metal base composite material, ceramic base composite material, and fibre composite material. The fiber composite material can be selected as reinforced parts according to strength, toughness and cost requirement, such as glassfiber, boronfiber, carbonfiber, organic fiber, ceramic fiber, metal fiber.The above-mentioned manufacturing method, interface structure, mechanical property, application, microdynamics, macrodynamics, strength, fracture, fatigue and design are all the c

description.zh: 本課程從電化學概念，電極電位，及腐蝕原理中建立學生腐蝕技術，包括DC極化法，AC阻抗法，諧波法，ER測試，ERR敏化測試高溫水溶液，應力腐蝕測試等，另外腐蝕壽命評估，材料腐蝕管理系統，核能電廠材料，地下緊密電位量測，水溶液腐蝕抑制效果，鋼筋混泥土結構防蝕效果評估均在本課程中一一介紹。

description.zh: 一、 簡介二、 電性質三、 介電性質四、 磁性質五、 光學性質

description.en: This course will provide tje principles of chemical separation technology as well as the related physical-chemical properties in order to have a extensive understanding of chemical separation technology.

description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 本課程旨在加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以分組討論、段落寫作與短文習作。
description.en: This course aims at providing the students with various reading strategies so that they may find the optimal straategies when they read independently; and furnishing the students with competence in writing.  Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world.  Students will be required to join class activites, which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 藉由歷代人物之表現形式，歸納出現代人可資取法之原則，以做為個人行事立身處事之參考。將歷代不同類型之人物，分成五個專題，由五位老師分別輪流至各班講授。
description.en: This course aims at providing a guide to role models for the people today from literary images in the history of Chinese Literature.   Five topics will be formed subject to their types and presented by five teachers in sequential periods.

description.zh: 本課程討論，化學中相關物理量的基本理論，技巧及應用等，特別是化學熱力學及電化學等。有關氣相，氣体定理，熱量，功，熱力學第一、第二及第三定律，焓，熵，自由能，相平衡，溶液，化學平衡，酸鹼，電化學，電極，電池，半反應等基礎理論之探討。
description.en: This course discuss the fundamental theory, technique and application with regards tophysical property in chemistry, especially at the chemical thermal dynamics and electrical chemistry. The research of the fundamental theory about gaseous phase,the gas laws, heat, work, the first, second and third law of the thermodynatmics, entropy, enthalpy, free energy, phase equilbrium, solution, chemicalequilbrium, acid and alkali, electrical chemistry, electrode,electric cell,half reaction ,etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在介紹與實際問題相關之數學領域，以模擬解題及詮釋等方式，將數學方法應用在工程問題上。課程內容有常微分方程，線性代數，向量微積分，Fourier 分析及偏微分方程式等章節，訓練同學在理論，計算及實驗間建立正確的認知及意義。內容將繼續介紹複數分析及數值方法等章節，尤其對計算機的概念及演算法乃給予較多的強調，對實際問題亦有簡化討論。另外，在應用解決問題構想，練習例題及理論間，更有相輔相成的效果。至於線性規化，圖形組合，機率理論及數學機率等內容亦有概略介紹，務使同學有正確的認知。
description.en: The course*s main taget is to introduce math region which is relating to practicalquestions with simulate solution and interpretation, it applies the math method to engineering questions. The course content includes ordinary differential equation,  linear algebra, vector calculus, Fourier analysis and partial differencial equation partial differential equation, with the aim to train students in establishing an exactperception to the meaning of theory, calculation and experimentation. it also introduces complex number analysis and numeric method, especially put moreemphasis at the computer concept and algorithm, a simplified discussion to thepractical problem as well. Besides, it has a mutual supporting effect in solvingquestion concepts, practising model question and theory. As to the linear programming, graphs and combinatorial optimization, probability theory and mathmetical probability, this course also has a brief introduction, its target is to let all the students

description.zh: 材料之特性取決於材料內部組織，所以課程內容也注重內部組織與材料特性之間的關係，內部組織的變化對材料特性之影響，由理論為基礎之探討至實際之應用上。對本課程有關的基本概念，則詳加說明，初學材料者能得到材料上所必備之基本知識，若基本概念已有充分了解，則利用這些知識即可參考材料規格或手冊就可得到欲知之條件，進而以此概念作基礎，亦可研習更高深之學問，本課程內容著重於介紹材料之結構，基本原理有： 1. 金屬之基本理論，金屬及合金之構造，材料之組織，塑性加工變形之理論，材料之物理化學，機械性質及其實驗。 2. 鋼和鐵之製造，組織及其熱處理，變態理論。 3. 構造用鋼，合金鋼，工具鋼，特殊鋼之特性、用途及其熱處理方法。4. 鋼之表面硬化理論及其熱處理方法。 5. 鑄鐵之冶煉，種類及其熱處理方法。6.非鐵金屬材料，銅，鋁，鈦，鎂，錫，鋅，鉛，鎳等合金種類之特性及其處理方法。
description.en: The chacteristics of material depend on the inside tissue, therefore, the content alsoput more emphasis on the relationship between the inside tissue and material chacter-istics, how the change of inside tissue influences it in full details from the discussion of the theory basis to practical application. It has a detail description to the basic ideaof this course, the novice may get requisite fundamental knowledge. Once they fullyperceive these basic ideas, they may refer to material specification or manual to getthe conditions they request, or they may use these fundation to further exploreadvanced knowledge. This course focus on introduction to the structure of material,its fundamental theorem includes the following items.

description.zh: 本課程介紹電子顯微鏡之結構分析，成像及繞射原理，以及在材料科學方面之應用，課程內容包括穿透式電子顯微鏡之構造電磁透鏡與成像原理電子繞射原理，繞射圖型分析，試片之製作方法。掃描式電子顯微鏡之構造及成像原理。EDS及WDS之X光光譜測量等。
description.en: The course introduces the structure of a electron microsope,the theories of forming image and diffraction, the applications of material science. The course contents include the transmission electron microscope structure,the electronic magnetic lens and image formation theory, electronic diffraction theory, diffraction diagram analysis, and the making of test sample, the structure and forming image principle of a scanning electron microscope, the X-ray spectrography of EDS and WDS.

description.zh: 本課程包括：1.陶瓷製程介紹，包括粉體製造、成形法、添加劑及燒結實務。2.材料基本概念，如陶瓷晶體結構、擴散、缺陷化學、固態反應等。3.結構陶瓷特性及檢測方法。4.電子陶瓷特性，包括介電性、鐵電性、半導性及檢測法。5.磁性材料特性及檢測。
description.en: The course includes:1.Introduction of ceramics manufacturing :	    Including powder manufacturing , forming method, additive and sintering 			practice.2.Material fundamental concept:		Such as ceramic crystal structure, diffusion, defective chemistry.3.Structural ceramic characteristics and detective method.4.Electrical ceramic characters:		Including dielectricity,ferro-electricity,semi-conductivity, and detective 			methods.5.Magnetic material characteristics and detection.

description.zh: 以金屬材料之基本觀念為基礎，更進一步探討銅，鋁，鎂，鎳等合金之特性、用途及其熱處理，並以近年來頗受注目的高強度鋁合金之特性，從組織結構加以探討。課程內容有:1.高強度鋁及鋁合金之種類，特性、用途及其熱處理探討。2.特殊及耐蝕銅及銅合金之種類，特性、用途及其熱處理探討。3.錫，鉛，鋅及其合金之種類，特性、用途探討。4.耐蝕，高強度鎳及鎳合金之種類，特性、用途探討。5.高強度，耐氧化性鈦及鈦合金之種類，特性、用途之探討。6.高科技用貴金屬之種類，特性、用途之探討。
description.en: Using the basic concept of metal material as foundation to further discuss thecharacteristics, usage and heat treatment of the alloy of Cu, Al, Mg,Ni, it alsodiscusses the eye-catching high strength property of aluminum alloy at the recentyears, and study it from the viewpoint of tissue structure. The course contentincludes the following items:1.The specification, usage and property of highstrength aluminum and aluminum alloy, and the study of their heat treatment. 2.The specification, usage and property of special copper, anti-corrosion copper andcopper alloy, and the study of their heat treatment. 3.The specification, usage andproperty study of Sn, Pb, Zn and their alloy. 4.The specification, usage and propertystudy of anti-corrosion, high strength nickle and nickle alloy. 5.The specification, usage and property study of high strength, oxidation resistant titanium and titaniumalloy.6.The specification, usage and property study of high-tech noble metal.

description.zh: 材料『機械行為』也稱『固體行為』。為有效選用固體材料（包括金屬、陶瓷、高分子）在機械及結構上可負載目標荷重及應力，並防止斷裂，確保安全。有賴從固體彈性變形，應力應變流體模型，合應力屈服強度，塑性變形模型，應力疲勞，應變疲勞、缺口疲勞、破壞力學觀念、裂紋成長、高溫潛變及減緩振動等逐項學習。介紹各種材料機械性質的基礎知識及各種機械性質的原理.
description.en: The mechanical behavior of material is also called solid behavior.In order to selecta solid material(including metal, ceramics and polymer) which is able to bear the objective load and stress at the mechanics and structure, and to prevent rupture for safety. It depends on the elastic deformation of solid, the fluid model of stress strain, the yield strength of synthetic stress, plastic deformation model, stress fatigue, strain fatigue, cleavage fatigue, destructive dynamics, crack growth, high temperature creep and alleviate vibration to learn the subject. It also introduces all kinds of fundamental knowledge and theory of material mechanic property.

description.zh: 本課程介紹高壓技術及工業上之應用.
description.en: High pressure technology and their application in industry.

description.zh: 本課程主要針對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質）.
description.en: 1.The structure of crystalline solids.2.Imperfections in solids.3.Phase transformation and phase equilibrium.4.Strengthening mechanism of materials.5.Metal alloys6.Ceramics7.Polymers

description.zh: 本課程包括概論、距離測量、水準測量、經緯儀測量、導線測量、平板儀測量、地形測量、礦區測量等。實習課程包括距離測量操作、水準測量操作、經緯儀測量、導線測量實作、平板儀測量實習、地形測量實習、礦區測量實習等
description.en: The surveying class includes general introduction, distance measurement, leveling measurement, theodolite, traversing, plane table surveying, topographical surveying and mine surveying.The surveying lab. is designed for student to operatevarious surveying equipment and instruments.  It includes distance measuring, leveling measurement, theodolite, traversing surveying, plane table surveying, topographical surveying and mine surveying.

description.zh: 本課程包括：1.陶瓷製程介紹，包括粉體製造、成形法、添加劑及燒結實務。2.材料基本概念，如陶瓷晶體結構、擴散、缺陷化學、固態反應等。3.結構陶瓷特性及檢測方法。4.電子陶瓷特性，包括介電性、鐵電性、半導性及檢測法。5.磁性材料特性及檢測。
description.en: The course includes: 1.Introduction of ceramics manufacturing : Including powder manufacturing , forming method, additive and sintering practice. 2.Material fundamental concept: Such as ceramic crystal structure, diffusion, defective chemistry. 3.Structural ceramic characteristics and detective method. 4.Electrical ceramic characters:including dielectricity,ferro-electricity,semi-conductivity, anddetective methods. 5.Magnetic material characteristics and detection.

description.zh: 在二十世紀眾多分歧的思想中，有些廣受人們的認同，並信奉為價值體系而實踐，此稱為思潮。這些流行的思潮，影響人民生活，社會生計，更影響著國家的發展方向。因此，這些思潮與國家發展有極為密切的關係。思潮的內容及其與國家發展的關係就是本課程的主要內容。當代思潮中，民族主義、國家主義與世界主義的理想不同，國家之運作便不相同；民主主義、共產主義影響各國的政治制度及人民的生活方式；資本主義、社會主義與共產主義關係著國計民生，在經濟、社會及生活各層面都深受其影響。本課程中第一部分介紹最具代表性的當代思潮，第二部份就民族思潮、經濟思潮與國家發展的關係加以剖析，藉以探討我國立國的精神所在，即民族平等、政治民主，經濟發展，以實現三民主義自由、民主、均富理想。
description.en: In the 21th century, there are numerous different thoughts in which some are well recognized, treasured and put in practice. These popular thoughts influence the livelihood, the society and the direction of national development. So contemporary thoughts plays an important role in national development. Such contemporary thoughts and national development are the key contents of this course.The ideal of such thoughts as Racism, Nationalism, and Cosmopolitanism differ from each other, so they have a different effect on national policy decision. Nationalism and Communism influence the political system of the nation and the lifestyle of its citizens. Capitalism, Socialism and Communism have a main impact on the social and economical issues and affect the quality of life of a nation. The first part of this course introduces the most representative contemporary thoughts. The second part analyzes the effect of national thoughts, political thoughts and economical thoughts on a nation.

description.zh: 由於重大工程建設陸續開發，對環境之衝擊也日益明顯，因此環境影響評估制度之建立與執行也極為迫切，環境影響評估確能有效抑制開發工程中所可能形成的污染行為，本課程之目的即在介紹環境影響評估制度的演進、各國相關之評估法制、環境影響評估之應用、評估方法（專家委員法、圖形重疊法、矩陣法及網路法）、評估流程及環境影響評估之追蹤考核等單元，期使選修者，對環境影響評估建立正確和科學的認知。
description.en: EIA (Environmental Impact Assessment) is interdisciplinary and involves large numbers of different practicals.In this course the theory will be firstly introduced,then the case studies will also be discussed.

description.zh: 本課程講授內容包含：(1)實驗室內測微器、荷重計、力學量度相關設備之介紹、(2)由模型結構的分析驗證課本之理論、(3)靜定梁、靜定桁架、靜定剛架之分析、(4)靜定結構的影響線分析、(5)超靜定結構的分析、(6)變位、(7)模型鋼筋籠之製作、RC模型梁破壞之行為、(8)影片之觀賞與討論。
description.en: The contents of this course are listed as follows:1.General structure instrumentation references.2.Measuring of load and deformation.3.The function of influence line and its application in     bridges.

description.zh: 土壤沖蝕1.農地水土保持,水土保持工程,土石流(1)小集水區求Q--合理化公式,滯洪池設計,個案研究,水土保持計畫研擬,專題討論.
description.en: Fluid mechanics,Hydrology,Statistics introduction.Soil erosion,Debris flow,Rational,Detention basin design.Agricultural soil conservation,Soil conservation engineering,Proposal writing,Case stud(Typhoon Herbur).Seminar.

description.zh: 期使學生瞭解地震工程學涵蓋之領域，並簡介地球物理學、地質學、地震學、振動學、材力、土壤力學、結構動力學、施工技術以及彈性波動學各領域之基本知識，讓學生領悟如何將各學門知識領域應用於地震工程之設計與施工。
description.en: Use of soil mechanics principles in the analysis,design,and construction of earth structures.Principles of compaction and compaction control;an introduction to slope stability analysis and landslides;earth reinforcement systems,and ground improvement techniques.

description.zh: 期使學生瞭解耐震設計之法規與設計步驟，並介紹營建工程結構物之耐震特性、設計方法及結構物隔震技術之應用，訓練學生能自行考慮與判斷結構物之耐震能力，以從事合理之耐震設計。
description.en: Use of soil mechanics principles in the analysis,design,and construction of structures.Principles of compaction and compaction control;an introduction to slope stability analysis and landslides;earth reinforcement systems,and ground impovement techniques.

description.zh: 基礎地盤若是軟弱土壤(例軟粘土,泥炭土,鬆砂土填土等)所構成時,則無法安全承載其上面建築物結構物,土堤等之載重,並且受交通車輛,機械振動地震等之動力作用亦最容易發生剪力破壞,滑動破壤及過大沈陷等安全問題.因此,對於這些軟弱土壤之工程性質要加以改善的必要.1.軟弱地盤之定義,種類與影響    2.軟弱地盤之調查目的及調查種類3.軟弱地盤之調查方法與步驟     4.軟弱土壤性質之測定5.軟弱地盤之改良方法(包括夯實工法,排水工法,預載重方法,動力壓密工法,爆破工法,振動揚實工法,注入工法,石灰穩定工法及其他穩定工法).
description.en: Soil Improvement is very important for embankments and foundations in construction engineering.This course deals with the following subjects:1.definition of soft ground2.types of soft soil.3.investigation methods of soft soils.4.improvement methods of soft ground(include compaction method,dewatering method,preloading method,dynamic consolidation method,vibrofloation method,injection method and soil-lime stabilization method.)

description.zh: 1.結構物劣化形態介紹2.目視檢測與非破生檢測3.現況評估與分析4.維修與補強設計
description.en: 1.Reterioration types of concrete structures 2.Visual and Non-destructive Inspection 3.Condition Evaluation and Analysis 4.Maintenance and Repair Design.

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生基本專業設計程式之寫作技巧，及應用現成專業套裝軟體達到輔助設計之能力，使學生能將專業之設計以電腦輔助來完成。
本課程著重環工設備及其相關檢測分析之操作與實習,期落實教本之理論,實驗包括下列之單元實習項目:1.混凝及沈澱     2.活性碳吸附      3.砂濾       4.活性污泥法5.薄膜技術       6.廢棄物採樣與分析    7.固化處理  8.重金屬溶出試驗與分析    9.營建工地逸散性粒狀物量測10.旋風分離器特性試驗.
description.en: To promate the knowledge of engineering and analysis equipments for atudents,the course,Experiments in Environmental Engineering ,focuses on practice and opertaion associated with the following iterms:1.Coagulation and Sendimentation2.Activates Carbon Adsorption3.Sand Filtration4.Activated Sludge Process5.Membrane Process6.Sampling and Analysis for Waste Characteristics7.Fixation8.Toxic ComponentsLeaching Procedure and Analysis9.Measurement of Total Suspended Particulates for Constrution Activity 10.Performace Test of Cyclone

description.zh: 討論各類工業廢水的處理理論，實際與應用，將工業廢水中之污染物分為懸浮固體，溶解固體及有機物，依各污染物之特性，依去除理論加以研討去除方法，再依各種工業廢水特性，講述去除方法的應用。
description.en: Discussing the theory, practice, and app;ication of wastewater treatment is the beginning of this course. Following that this study will classify the pullotants into SS, Ds, and organic compounds, and then discuss the removal methods basing on their individual characteristics.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 本課程旨在加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以分組討論、段落寫作與短文習作。

Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world.  Students will be required to join class activites, which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 提供本校二技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的限制，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers such a good opportunity for the two-year college students in this university that they might have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge in the hope that students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.en: Soil exploration and groundwater sampling;in-situ determination of properties using the split spoon,cone,dilatometer,pressuremeter,and vane equipment.Instrumentation for monitoring field performance and challeges associated with exploration and monitoring ingeotechnica/geoenvironmental engineering.

description.zh: 本課程主要教授學生七大項方向1.複習矩陣學2.結構矩陣學基本概念3.勁度法觀念4.勁度法解桁架問題5.勁度法解梁問題6.勁度法解剛架問題7.程式分析實習
description.en: The course contents are divided into 7 major topics: 1. Review the matrix theory; 2.Basic concepts of the matrix structural theory; 3. Stiffness method; 4. Using stiffness method to solve truss problem; 5. Using stiffness method to solve beam problem; 6. Using stiffness method to solve rigid frame problem; 7. Practice of the structural analysis program.

description.zh: 由於近年來電腦科技發展迅速，在透過地理資訊系統的幫助下，圖文整合的資料庫型態，已有相當完整成熟的作業方式。本課程將針對地理資訊系統的應用功能方向，分別剖析其主要架構與理論。同時配合相關地理資訊系統軟體，建立學員實作能力。

Contents of the course include:Definition and classification of waste.Storage and transportation,Incineration,Fixation,Landfill and Overall planning of treatmrnt plant.

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物減量與資源回收再利用之相關方法與技術為主,使學生從學習過程中瞭解廢棄物4R之原理,此包括:1.減廢方法與技術 2.資源化方法與技術 3.廢棄物再利用方法與技術4.廢棄物生命週期之分析  5.減廢策略與管理體系.
description.en: "Waste Reduction and Recovery"is a course to introduce the principle of 4R in waste management. Contents of the course consiste of approches and technology for waste minimitation.recovery and reuse,life cycle analysis,and management policy.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的有二：一在使學生明瞭鋼結構構件的強度與行為，二則在介紹相關設計規範的內容及應用。課程中除對拉力、壓力、彎曲等構件之分析設計詳加介紹外，並探討構件結合之初步理念。期使修習學生能對鋼結構設計之步驟及依據有足夠的瞭解。

本課旨在介紹各種基礎工程施工。課程摘要可分：(1)概說、(2)基礎種類、(3)基礎之支承力、(4)支承力試驗、(5)基礎開挖、(6)直接基礎、(7)樁基概說、製造、打擊之法、(8)場樁施工、穩定液泥水管理、(9)反循環鑽掘工法、(10)貝諾特工法、(11)土鑽工法、(12)預壘樁、(13)深基礎工法、(14)開口沈箱、(15)地下連續壁、(16)地錨、(17)地下構造物、(18)水平方向推進工法、(19)托底工法。
description.en: With the knowledge of Soil Mechanics and Foundation Engineering, a series of underground construction methods will be elaborated. They are slurry diaphragm wall,pile foundation (reverse,or cased),anchor system, foundation excavation,drainage system,bracing system and monitoring system etc.

description.zh: A.質點運動:1.位置,速度和加速度2.直線運動 3.曲線運動 4.軌道運動 5.相對運動 B.質點運動力學:1.牛頓運動定律 2.慣性參考構架 3.質量中心的運動方程式.C. 能量法:功與動能:1.功與功率;位能 3.保守力 4.保守能 D.動量法:1.動量與衡量原則 2.保守線性動量 3.衝擊力 4.角動量 5.質量流

description.zh: 在二十世紀眾多分歧的思想中，有些廣受人們的認同，並信奉為價值體系而實踐，此稱為思潮。這些流行的思潮，影響人民生活，社會生計，更影響著國家的發展方向。因此，這些思潮與國家發展有極為密切的關係。思潮的內容及其與國家發展的關係就是本課程的主要內容。當代思潮中，民族主義、國家主義與世界主義的理想不同，國家之運作便不相同；民主主義、共產主義影響各國的政治制度及人民的生活方式；資本主義、社會主義與共產主義關係著國計民生，在經濟、社會及生活各層面都深受其影響。本課程中第一部分介紹最具代表性的當代思潮，第二部份就民族思潮、經濟思潮與國家發展的關係加以剖析，藉以探討我國立國的精神所在，即民族平等、政治民主，經濟發展，以實現三民主義自由、民主、均富理想。
description.en: In the 21th century, there are numerous different thoughts in which some are well recognized, treasured and put in practice. These popular thoughts influence the livelihood, the society and the direction of national development. So contemporary thoughts plays an important role in national development. Such contemporary thoughts and national development are the key contents of this course.The ideal of such thoughts as Racism, Nationalism, and Cosmopolitanism differ from each other, so they have a different effect on national policy decision. Nationalism and Communism influence the political system of the nation and the lifestyle of its citizens. Capitalism, Socialism and Communism have a main impact on the social and economical issues and affect the quality of life of a nation. The first part of this course introduces the most representative contemporary thoughts. The second part analyzes the effect of national thoughts, political thoughts and economical thoughts on a nation.

These topics are grouped into four parts as follow :1.Devoted to the basic theory and mathematical of reliability   engineering. 2.Deal with electronic system reliability design practices :   Circuit simplification , parts selection and application ,   Hi-Rel parts screening , Derating , Transients suppression   and protection circuits , EMC design , Thermal and   vibration design , and Redundancy. 3.Dosvusses the reliability analysis methods : Reliability   modeling and prediction , Failure mode、effects and   criticality analysis (FMECA) , and Fault tree analysis   (FTA). 4.Dedicated to reliability testing : Environmental streess   screening (ESS) , Reliability growth test , Reliability   qualification test , and Accelerated life test.

description.zh: 在二十世紀眾多分歧的思想中，有些廣受人們的認同，並信奉為價值體系而實踐，此稱為思潮。這些流行的思潮，影響人民生活，社會生計，更影響著國家的發展方向。因此，這些思潮與國家發展有極為密切的關係。思潮的內容及其與國家發展的關係就是本課程的主要內容。當代思潮中，民族主義、國家主義與世界主義的理想不同，國家之運作便不相同；民主主義、共產主義影響各國的政治制度及人民的生活方式；資本主義、社會主義與共產主義關係著國計民生，在經濟、社會及生活各層面都深受其影響。本課程中第一部分介紹最具代表性的當代思潮，第二部份就民族思潮、經濟思潮與國家發展的關係加以剖析，藉以探討我國立國的精神所在，即民族平等、政治民主，經濟發展，以實現三民主義自由、民主、均富理想。
description.en: In the 21th century, there are numerous different thoughts in which some are well recognized, treasured and put in practice. These popular thoughts influence the livelihood, the society and the direction of national development. So contemporary thoughts plays an important role in national development. Such contemporary thoughts and national development are the key contents of this course.The ideal of such thoughts as Racism, Nationalism, and Cosmopolitanism differ from each other, so they have a different effect on national policy decision. Nationalism and Communism influence the political system of the nation and the lifestyle of its citizens. Capitalism, Socialism and Communism have a main impact on the social and economical issues and affect the quality of life of a nation. The first part of this course introduces the most representative contemporary thoughts. The second part analyzes the effect of national thoughts, political thoughts and economical thoughts on a nation.

description.zh: 本課程以提供二技及四技學生標準訂定有關各類問題解答方法。本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: Linear programming, Network analysis, Dynamic programming, Game theory, (Non)Integer linear programming, Markov chains(Markovian decision process), Queueing theory, Inventory models, Forecasting models, Decision analysis and system simulation.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解全面品質管理的意義、理念、重要性、範圍、實施條件、方法、品管工具，品管工具以外的管理工具、方法，實施全面品管遭遇到的問題，實施全面品質管理的預期成效。
description.en: This course introduces the meaning, theories, importance, scope, implementation constraints, methods, quality control tools of TQM.  Besides, the other management tools and approaches are also included.  The course also contains the possible problems and expected effective as implementing.

description.zh: 本課程中包含下列主題：1.簡介；2.電子商店的行銷策略；3.電子商店的建   置；4. 電子商店的經營與管理；5. 電子商店的法律問題；6.案例介紹；7.結論。

description.zh: 結合工作衡量之基礎及人事管理之應用，並使用工業工程之基本管理知識，使學生瞭解績效管理之概念、程序、方法及步驟，達成最終提昇工作績效之目地。

The subjects includes computer information system, data collection, data analysis, system analysis, decision making and analysis, database management, and expert systems.

description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 本課程旨在加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以分組討論、段落寫作與短文習作。
description.en: This course aims at providing the students with various reading strategies so that they may find the optimal straategies when they read independently; and furnishing the students with competence in writing.  Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world.  Students will be required to join class activites, which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 提供本校二技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的限制，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers such a good opportunity for the two-year college students in this university that they might have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge in the hope that students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。介紹資料庫系統之基本概念，熟悉基本指令及操作方法，使之能輕易建立資料檔案，並可對其資料進行擷取、添加、刪除、修改、編輯、排序、建立索引及產生標準報表列印等，且開發一套簡易應用軟體。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of database system.  The students can understand the operation process in order to develop the data file.  In addition, the retrieval, add, delete, modify, edit and sorting of data files are also provided.  Finally, the students can develop a DBMS for themselves.

description.zh: 本課程適合一般大專行銷管理之授課。其目的在尋求優良的產品行銷管理方法，以求企業之良好利潤。本課程授課內容在使學生瞭解行銷管理之觀念，產品設計、產品運銷、促銷及訂價。相關之授課內容包括：市場區隔、市場組織、購買行為、產品開發、零售、批發、促銷、廣告及訂價程序等。
description.en: This course purpose is searching excellence marketing approach, and presents complete of the essential marketing concepts, processes, strategies, and tactics most commonly used by the marketing manager.  Students are enable understanding of the field: marketing management, planning, situations, decisions, actions and issues.

description.zh: 本課程著重實務應用，內容將涵蓋現場改的原則與基本技術，生產流程的改善技術，現場庫存與交其改善的技術，設施佈置改善技術；降低成本的技術，目視管理的改善技術，生產效率改善技術，生產系統的改善技術等。
description.en: This course will focus on the topic of On-Job Improvement principle, production flow improvement, inventory control, facility planning, cost reduction, efficiency and production system improvement etc.

description.zh: 本課程以提供二技及四技學生標準訂定有關各類問題解答方法。本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生瞭解生產計畫與管制的基本概念，訓練學生對於生產計畫與管制的各項方法，制度設計及改善等具有基本認識，並應用管理科學及作業研究於生產計畫與管制之研究發展。本課程包括下列主題：生產計畫與管制概論、產品設計與發展、預測、來源需求規畫、生產排程、總排程、存貨管理、豐田式管理、專案規畫與管理等。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of production planning and control.  In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided.  This course is consisted of the following subjects: introduction, product design and development, forecasting, resources requirement planning, production scheduling, total scheduling, inventory management, Toyota management, and project management.

description.zh: 本課程分為Dreamweaver網頁設計、PHP與MySQL基礎，以及互動網頁設計等三部份。包括Dreamweaver的網頁圖文編輯、表格製作、超連結、分割框架、佈景主題應用、動態網頁、表單設計、網站的發佈與管理，以及PHP與MySQL環境設定、MySQL資料庫管理、SQL基本語法、PHP程式設計入門、用PHP存取MySQL等；讓同學有能力設計一個商業網站。
description.en: The course is for the designation of commercial web site. The is course composed of 3 parts:（1）Dreamweaver（2）PHP（3）MySQL data base.Learning how to build up the commercial website.

description.zh: 任何計畫、產品或服務之壽命週期起始自需要分析，其次為決定需求和規格，接著為設計和執行，最後經由使用階段，在支援和維護下完成此計畫。而在進行經濟分析，應對貨幣之時間價值、投資報酬率、損益平衡、公司債券、現金流量、有效利率、最小成本壽命、通貨膨脹、成本估計、折舊、所得稅、資金成本、更新分析、敏感性分析和風險決策分析等要點，以求估計值之準確性、方案抉擇決策之正確性。
description.en: Engineering / management analysis of the economic aspects of public and private project proposals. Decisions involving the expenditure of capital funds. Alternative sources of funds; time value of money; methods of evaluating alternative project.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。人因工程旨在研究調查人類的能力、限制、行為和其他特性等知識，而應用於工具、設備、系統、任務、工作和環境等的設計，以提高人類生活品質及生產力。所探討的內容可歸納如下：人因工程的研究方法、人體設計、人員的感覺歷程、人員的資訊處理、人員的體力活動、人機介面設計、作業環境、安全與衛生等。
description.en: Human factors is dedicated to discover and survey human beings' capability, limit, behavior and other futures.  And then apply it to the design of tools, facilities, systems, works and environments in order to enhance the quality of life and productivity.  The course includes research approaches, physical design, human being's feeling process and information process, human/machine interface, operating environments, and safety.

description.zh: 本課程適用於一般大專之決策分析課程。其目的在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。本課程授課主題包括：不考慮機率之決策問題、與機率有關之決策問題、獲取額外資訊之決策分析、效益分析、遊戲理論。相關之授課內容包括：機率分配、期望值方法、貝氏分析、完全資訊與額外資訊之期望值。
description.en: This is an undergraduate course dealing with decison making and analysis.The objective of this course is to interpret the basic concepts of decision theory and its applications on some real world decision analysis problims.The main topics of this course include decision making without probability,decision making with probability,decison analysis with additional information,utility theory,gametheory.The related studies includes prlbability distribution,expected value approach,Bayesian analysis,expected value of perfect informatin and sample information.

description.zh: 探討產品機能和成本配合的關係，綜合企業內所有知識和技能，做有系統、有組織的設計、材料種類、與型態改善，以達成降低成本，提高製程功能和品質。
description.en: Value Management (VM) is an organized, systematic approach to obtaining optimal value for every industry. The learning and training topics are: the system approach, opportunities, application and methodology for value management. Also, involve managing project value through lift cycle costing, problem solving and project value and case studies.

description.zh: 從企業經理人的觀點來操討談判的有關問題，旨在提供學生對談判佑識的了解，並熟悉談判的實務運用。課程重心涵蓋談判的本質與觀念性架構，談判的理論與模型，談判的規劃、執行與控制，談判的策略與技能。上課方式操研討為主，並操分組報告與討論。
description.en: The viewpoint of business manager focus into the issues of negotiation. The objectives of this course are to provide understanding some of the core concepts of the negotiation and to acquaint application approach of the practice. The negotiation topics cover: (1) nature, conceptual, framework, theory and model and (2) to analyze, plan, strategy, tactics, and implement successful negotiation. This can povide groups discussion and improve speaking skills.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 本課程旨在加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以分組討論、段落寫作與短文習作。
description.en: This course aims at providing the students with various reading strategies so that they may find the optimal straategies when they read independently; and furnishing the students with competence in writing.  Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world.  Students will be required to join class activites, which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 提供本校二技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的限制，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers such a good opportunity for the two-year college students in this university that they might have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge in the hope that students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。本課程內容為：零災害、指認呼喚、預知危險、衛生防護具及儀器之保養檢查及使用、職業災害之調查與處理、特殊器械的使用、工作環境認知－通風、採光、噪音、缺氧、輻射。
description.en: The course includes zero disaster, recognition calling, danger pre-recognition, sanitation protection facilities and their maintenance, survey and arrangement of vocational danger, use of special facilities, and recognition of working environment, e.g. brightness, radiation and noise.

description.zh: 介紹 C++ 語言基本資料處理的概念， 包含基本輸入與輸出、程式的流程控制、函數的應用等指令之撰寫、程式之編輯、編譯、聯絡與程式之執行，並發展一套應用程式。
description.en: This course introduces the basic data processes of C++ language.  They include input/output, program process control, application of functions, program editing and execution, and so on.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。介紹資料庫系統之基本概念，熟悉基本指令及操作方法，使之能輕易建立資料檔案，並可對其資料進行擷取、添加、刪除、修改、編輯、排序、建立索引及產生標準報表列印等，且開發一套簡易應用軟體。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of database system.  The students can understand the operation process in order to develop the data file.  In addition, the retrieval, add, delete, modify, edit and sorting of data files are also provided.  Finally, the students can develop a DBMS for themselves.

description.zh: 本課程適合一般大專行銷管理之授課。其目的在尋求優良的產品行銷管理方法，以求企業之良好利潤。本課程授課內容在使學生瞭解行銷管理之觀念，產品設計、產品運銷、促銷及訂價。相關之授課內容包括：市場區隔、市場組織、購買行為、產品開發、零售、批發、促銷、廣告及訂價程序等。
description.en: This course purpose is searching excellence marketing approach, and presents complete of the essential marketing concepts, processes, strategies, and tactics most commonly used by the marketing manager.  Students are enable understanding of the field: marketing management, planning, situations, decisions, actions and issues.

description.zh: 本課程著重實務應用，內容將涵蓋現場改的原則與基本技術，生產流程的改善技術，現場庫存與交其改善的技術，設施佈置改善技術；降低成本的技術，目視管理的改善技術，生產效率改善技術，生產系統的改善技術等。
description.en: This course will focus on the topic of On-Job Improvement principle, production flow improvement, inventory control, facility planning, cost reduction, efficiency and production system improvement etc.

description.zh: 本課程以提供二技及四技學生標準訂定有關各類問題解答方法。本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: Linear programming, Network analysis, Dynamic programming, Game theory, (Non)Integer linear programming, Markov chains(Markovian decision process), Queueing theory, Inventory models, Forecasting models, Decision analysis and system simulation.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生瞭解生產計畫與管制的基本概念，訓練學生對於生產計畫與管制的各項方法，制度設計及改善等具有基本認識，並應用管理科學及作業研究於生產計畫與管制之研究發展。本課程包括下列主題：生產計畫與管制概論、產品設計與發展、預測、來源需求規畫、生產排程、總排程、存貨管理、豐田式管理、專案規畫與管理等。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of production planning and control.  In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided.  This course is consisted of the following subjects: introduction, product design and development, forecasting, resources requirement planning, production scheduling, total scheduling, inventory management, Toyota management, and project management.

description.zh: 本課程分為Dreamweaver網頁設計、PHP與MySQL基礎，以及互動網頁設計等三部份。包括Dreamweaver的網頁圖文編輯、表格製作、超連結、分割框架、佈景主題應用、動態網頁、表單設計、網站的發佈與管理，以及PHP與MySQL環境設定、MySQL資料庫管理、SQL基本語法、PHP程式設計入門、用PHP存取MySQL等；讓同學有能力設計一個商業網站。
description.en: The course is for the designation of commercial web site. The is course composed of 3 parts:（1）Dreamweaver（2）PHP（3）MySQL data base.Learning how to build up the commercial website.

description.zh: 任何計畫、產品或服務之壽命週期起始自需要分析，其次為決定需求和規格，接著為設計和執行，最後經由使用階段，在支援和維護下完成此計畫。而在進行經濟分析，應對貨幣之時間價值、投資報酬率、損益平衡、公司債券、現金流量、有效利率、最小成本壽命、通貨膨脹、成本估計、折舊、所得稅、資金成本、更新分析、敏感性分析和風險決策分析等要點，以求估計值之準確性、方案抉擇決策之正確性。
description.en: Engineering / management analysis of the economic aspects of public and private project proposals. Decisions involving the expenditure of capital funds. Alternative sources of funds; time value of money; methods of evaluating alternative project.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。人因工程旨在研究調查人類的能力、限制、行為和其他特性等知識，而應用於工具、設備、系統、任務、工作和環境等的設計，以提高人類生活品質及生產力。所探討的內容可歸納如下：人因工程的研究方法、人體設計、人員的感覺歷程、人員的資訊處理、人員的體力活動、人機介面設計、作業環境、安全與衛生等。
description.en: Human factors is dedicated to discover and survey human beings' capability, limit, behavior and other futures.  And then apply it to the design of tools, facilities, systems, works and environments in order to enhance the quality of life and productivity.  The course includes research approaches, physical design, human being's feeling process and information process, human/machine interface, operating environments, and safety.

description.zh: 探討產品機能和成本配合的關係，綜合企業內所有知識和技能，做有系統、有組織的設計、材料種類、與型態改善，以達成降低成本，提高製程功能和品質。
description.en: Value Management (VM) is an organized, systematic approach to obtaining optimal value for every industry. The learning and training topics are: the system approach, opportunities, application and methodology for value management. Also, involve managing project value through lift cycle costing, problem solving and project value and case studies.

description.zh: 本課程之設計係針對非歷史系學生研習之用，基本上著重以宏觀的角度作歷史趨勢的闡述。課程方面包括中、西歷史觀念的比較與中國歷代政治、經濟、社會、文化的歷史演進，藉以幫助學生認識時代之趨勢與意義。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內，能對中國歷史有一簡要而清晰的了解，並對日後的生活有所裨益。
description.en: This course is designed for non-history majors. It is chiefly intended to interpret the development of the Chinese history in a comprehensive perspective so that students may have a better understanding of the historical trends and their implications and may thus benefit from such an understanding. The course includes the following topics: a comparison of Chinese and Western concepts of history, the political, economic, social, and cultural developments of the Chinese history. The class activities include lectures and discussions; students are also required to submit written reports.

description.zh: 本課程延續演說與辯論（一）之課程，並加強人際溝通、說服策略、辯論技巧與演練。
description.en: This course strengthens the skills and strategies necessary for interpersonal communication, persuasion, and debate.

description.zh: 翻譯各式文體風格之文章，賞析名家之譯作，涵括文學、科學、教育、商業等領域作品，並佐以特殊表現法及修辭法之認識及練習。
description.en: This course aims at an appreciation of various styles of translated works in such fields as literature, education, science & technology, commerce. so as to equip students with a deep insight into the usage of rhetoric and expression for particular purpose.

description.zh: 本課程以逐步口譯為主﹐深入模擬商務訪談﹐會議溝通﹐外賓接待至國際會議主持﹐隨行口譯﹐各式談判之概論與實例解說。課程注重模擬﹐演練及禮儀文化的涵養，以期訓練學生語言應對的能力及良好風度的表現。
description.en: This course focuses on Consecutive Interpretation. It simulates a commercial meeting and communication, visitors reception, international conference hosting and escort interpretation. In addition, it includes a general theory of different negotiations and examples. The course concentrates on simulation, practicum and courtesy cultivation. We expect to build up students' dialogue ability and manners.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎日語能力，加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic Japanese abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Japanese language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic German abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the German language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎法語能力，加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic French abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the French language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎西班牙語能力，加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic Spanish abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Spanish language.

description.zh: 本課程因應二十一世紀工商領軍時代的需求，透過國際語言進行訓練生活，經貿，勞資及國際事務之溝通與談判，理論與實務並重，循序漸進，培訓英語溝通及談判人才。
description.en: In response to demands of an industry-leading age in the 21 century, this course uses the international language of English to conduct communication and negotiation in daily life, commercial & trade, labor-capital, and international problems. The course integrates theory and practicum in gradual procession to cultivate students to become professionals in communication and negotiation.

description.zh: 本課程以當代文學批評和文化理論為基礎，探討小說與戲劇改編成電影的過程中，文字轉化成視覺意象之間的差異，期能提升多元化的思辯及表達能力。
description.en: Drawing upon modern literary criticism and cultural theory, this course aims to examine the difference between works of literature and the distinctive medium of the cinema. Students will be offered a variety of discussion which stimulates the kinds of critical thinking that lead to a better understanding of the process of transposition from literature to film.

description.zh: 本課程主要在於讓學生熟悉英語資訊教育課程、目標暨教學法，各類電腦輔助教學軟體應用與評估，多媒體物件實作，資訊網路建立，遠距教學等專項，使理論與實際結合。
description.en: This course is designed to help the students to become familiarized with English programs on information education, understanding their objectives and pedagogy, trying to apply and evaluate diverse types of computer-aided software,  practically producing multi-media objects, and knowing how to establish information network of long-distance (on-line) teaching and learning systems, so that the theoretical ideas can merge into real practice.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world.  Students will be required to join class activites, which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 藉由歷代人物之表現形式，歸納出現代人可資取法之原則，以做為個人行事立身處事之參考。將歷代不同類型之人物，分成五個專題，由五位老師分別輪流至各班講授。
description.en: This course aims at providing a guide to role models for the people today from literary images in the history of Chinese Literature.   Five topics will be formed subject to their types and presented by five teachers in sequential periods.

description.zh: 提供本校二技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的限制，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
