description.zh: 大二下學期為軍訓（四）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：中外戰史－－選擇近代中外著名戰爭，剖析其發生原因、作戰經過、成敗得失之關鍵因素，以及其對國家民族前途之影響，使學生從認識戰爭中吸取歷史經驗與教訓，進而體認戰爭勝敗對國家民族存亡發展息息相關，激發愛國情操。軍略地理－－使學生透過地略知識，了解國防地理因素與國家戰略之關係，並體認國防軍事建設之建軍備戰作為。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。模糊對局理論與兵棋推演－－該理論在協助指揮官在作戰判斷時能更具體化分析敵我狀況，以利草擬作戰計劃及下達決心。心戰謀略－－藉由研究波斯灣戰爭中的心戰措施，以了解平時或戰時的心戰與宣傳技巧。新世代領導－－介紹當代頗具聲望的領導人，以期學者能效法他們的風範及應用其經驗與技巧於日常生活中。
description.en: Military Training includes three courses at the second semester of second year. They are The History of Wars, The Military Strategy of Geography, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of them. The History of Wars analyzes details of war and what it can bring to nation and her people. The Military Strategy of Geography tells the importance of geography in war and how the geography influences the making of strategy. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind. The theory is to help commander precisely analyze the battlefield situation and then draft war plan and make decision. Sychological warfare strategy－By researching the sychological warfare during gulf war. We can make clear conception about sychological war and propaganda skill during war or peacetime. X,Y,Z generation leadership introduce contemplate celebrities who have good reputation on leadership in the hope that learner can emulate their leadership cha

description.zh: 本程主要教授學生熟悉：(1)結構之穩定與靜定性、(2)靜定結構之分析、(3)梁之剪力、彎矩圖、(4)影響線與移動力、(5)結構之彈性變形、(6)靜不定結構分析─諧合變位法、(7)靜不定結構之影響線。
description.en: Fundamental theory of statically indeterminate structures;analysis of indeterminate beams,frames,and trusses by stiffness and flexibility methods;study of influence lines for beams,frames,and trusses.

description.zh: 使同學瞭解土壤之基本物理性質、土壤分類及土壤之力學行為。課程內容為土壤成因、土壤基本物理性質、阿太堡限度及粒徑分析、土壤分類、土壤滲透及及滲流、土壤之壓縮及密壓作用、土壤剪力強度及剪力變形、土壤之夯實。
description.en: This course deals with (1)origin of soils (2)physical properties of soils (3)analysis and classification of soils (4)capillarity of soils and frost heave (5)permeability of soils and seepage problems (6)compressibility of soils and consolidation (7)shear strength and shear defermation of soils (8)lateral earth pressure (9)stability analysis of slopes (10)compaction of soils.

description.zh: 使同學透過實際操作，了解土壤力學試驗方法及土壤之性質，課程內容包含：土壤含水量測定、比重試驗、空隙比及飽和度測定、阿太堡限度試驗、粒徑分析（篩分析與比重計試驗）、夯實試驗、土壤滲透性測定、單向度壓密試驗、C.B.R.試驗、單軸壓縮試驗、直接剪力試驗、三軸壓縮試驗、相對密度測定。
description.en: This course deals with (1)trimming of samples (2)measurement of water content,voidratio,porosity and degree of saturation (3)liquid limit test (4)plastic limit test (5)specific gravity test (6)grain-size analysis (7)field density test (8)permeability test (9)compaction test (10)CBR test (11)consolidation test (12)direct shear test (13)unconfined compression test (14)triaxial compression test.

description.zh: 使學者學習流體力學基本理論。課程內容概要：(1)緒論、(2)真實流體流動、(3)管流理論、(4)可壓縮性流體、(5)邊界層理論、(6)昇力理論、(7)渠流理論。
description.en: Fundamentals of fluid mechanics,Model similitude,Pipe flow,Open channel flow.

description.zh: 環境生態學主要講述基本生態學之原理原則，進而應用於土木建設工程的方式主要內容包含：(1)環境生態系統、(2)生態學之基本法則、(3)質與能傳遞、(4)汙染物對生態之影響、(5)台灣地區之生態保育、(6)工程開發生態系統造成之影響、(7)環境影響評估、(8)交通及營建工程之環境問題、(9)全球環境變遷、(10)環境品質與法規。
description.en: How to use the national sources in a way to have sustainable development is the main purpose of this study. Improper usage of resources will bring a serious disaster from the natural feed back. Construction should take care of the ecology system and the methods of carefulness would be studied in this course.

description.zh: 介紹工程契約之內容與種類，以及其實際的作業程序及相關的投標規定；此外並說明規範的製定內涵與意義，同時探討其對工程之影響與重要性。
1.線性聯立微分方程2.向量分析3.富利葉級數及富利葉積分4.偏微分方程及邊界值問題
description.en: This course deals with the following subjects:Ⅰ.Ordinary Differential Equations   Ⅱ.Laplace TnangformsⅢ.Vector AnalysisⅣ.Matrices and DeterminantsⅤ.Fourier SeriesⅥ.Partial Differential Equatians

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 大一下學期為軍訓（二）零學分，概述如下： 領導統御－－使學生了解領導統御之原則、要領、方法及群眾心理，增進領導統御能力，以期在未來事業上，能發揮人性潛能，激勵團隊精神，提高工作效率。海軍概要－－使學生了解海軍沿革及海權之重要性、海軍任務、海軍組織、海軍各類型作戰及未來發展，增進對海軍之認識。空軍概要－－使學生了結解空軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、作戰、後勤及未來發展，以增進對空軍之認識。大一女生軍訓課程包括護理與健康，概述如下：護理與健康－－使學生瞭解人生過程中如何實現一個健康的生活；在社會多變複雜的環境下如何自我調適、化解工作壓力、求取心理的平衡；在日益開放兩性交往如何約制一些不正常的行為，以及了解對各種疾病的預防等諸般護理常識，以促進身心健康幸福人生。進而在戰時支援國防以達強國強種之目的。
description.en: The topics of military training during the second semester. The skill of leadership—is designed to make student understand the principles and methods of leadership that will benefit to individuals careers. The introduction of Navy—focus on NAVY's history, task, character, organization and the future development. The introduction of Air Forces—makes students to better understand the Air Force's history, task, trait, organization, education, operation, logistics and future development. The female military training during the second semester are nursing and health. These courses are to teach how to live a healthy life; and cultivate the ability of self-adjustment, releasing pressure and balancing mind. Furthermore, it focus on how to curb abnormal behaviors, and how to prevent diseases and nursing commonsense.

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh: 一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en: This training is designated to help students establishcommunicative skills through natural and authentic English,contextualized in lively, interesting situations related tostudents' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important featuresof English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providingstudents with a wide range of useful conversationalexpressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in classdiscussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 使學生認知測量是各項工程建設的一項重要基礎性先行的工作，使能適應各項測量外業觀測、內業計算及繪圖等作業。課程概要如下：1)測量之基本概念、(2)各種測量儀器的認識與使用、(3)控制測量（括三角、三邊導線高程等)之施測方法及計算、(4)地形圖及地籍圖之測及應用、(5)各項工程放樣測量。
description.en: Theory and practice with compass,transit,level,and stadia.Computations of area,earthwork volumes,and horizontal and vertical curves;astronomical observations;boundary surveying;and map plotting.

description.zh: 配合測量學之講授，作相互之印證，以期融會貫通，落實提昇測量教學之效果。課程概要：(1)各項儀器之使用實習、(2)距離、高程、角度測量實習、(3)控制測量實習、(4) 地形測量實習、(5) 定線實習。
description.en: Theory and practice with compass,transit,level,and stadia.Computations of area,earthwork volumes,and horizontal and vertical curves;astronomical observations;boundary surveying;and map plotting.

description.zh: 課程中許多問題與工程應用有直接關係，此一形式為使學生摩擬實際情況，並減少物理性的描述，授課內容如下：(1)緒論、(2)量力學、(3)質點平衡、(4)力系合成、(5)剛體之平衡、(6)結構分析、(7)內、(8)摩擦、(9)重心與質心、(10)慣性矩、(11)虛功原理。
description.en: Engineering applications of equilibrium of forces.Vector operations,couple and moment of force,resultants,center of gravity and center of pressure,static friction,free body diagrams,equilibrium,trusses and frames.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是為了：1.驗證物理理論之真實性，2.培養同學認真的科學態度與方法，3.培養同學數據處理的能力，4.啟發同學自行設計解決量度問題的方法。課程之施行分為上下兩學期，每一學期為一學分三小時。上學期的內容偏重力學、波動、熱力、流力之實驗，下學期的內容則偏重電磁、光學、近物之實驗。
description.en: In this course there will be 1 credit for each of two semesters, and 3 laboraborial hours per week. The first semester experiments involve mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, and waves, etc.. The second semester experiments contains electromagnetics, optics, and modern physics, etc.. The purposes of this course are 1: to identify the physical laws, 2:to cultivate the ability of data reduction of students, 4: to instruct the students solving the problems of measurements of measurements by self-designments.

description.zh: 工程地質對於工程結構物之規劃、設計、施工、維護等均有重要關係。本課程內容包括：(1)地質調查、(2)岩石之風化及其性質、(3)地下探查、(4)地球物理探測、(5)邊坡滑動與山坡、(6)建築物、結構物之基礎、(7)公路與鐵路、(8)隧道、(9)壩址地質調查。
description.en: Fundamentals of mineralogy,petrology,sedimentation,stratigraphy,and structural geology needed by environmental scientists tounderstant earth materials.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 大一下學期為軍訓（二）零學分，概述如下： 領導統御－－使學生了解領導統御之原則、要領、方法及群眾心理，增進領導統御能力，以期在未來事業上，能發揮人性潛能，激勵團隊精神，提高工作效率。海軍概要－－使學生了解海軍沿革及海權之重要性、海軍任務、海軍組織、海軍各類型作戰及未來發展，增進對海軍之認識。空軍概要－－使學生了結解空軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、作戰、後勤及未來發展，以增進對空軍之認識。大一女生軍訓課程包括護理與健康，概述如下：護理與健康－－使學生瞭解人生過程中如何實現一個健康的生活；在社會多變複雜的環境下如何自我調適、化解工作壓力、求取心理的平衡；在日益開放兩性交往如何約制一些不正常的行為，以及了解對各種疾病的預防等諸般護理常識，以促進身心健康幸福人生。進而在戰時支援國防以達強國強種之目的。
description.en: The topics of military training during the second semester. The skill of leadership—is designed to make student understand the principles and methods of leadership that will benefit to individuals careers. The introduction of Navy—focus on NAVY's history, task, character, organization and the future development. The introduction of Air Forces—makes students to better understand the Air Force's history, task, trait, organization, education, operation, logistics and future development. The female military training during the second semester are nursing and health. These courses are to teach how to live a healthy life; and cultivate the ability of self-adjustment, releasing pressure and balancing mind. Furthermore, it focus on how to curb abnormal behaviors, and how to prevent diseases and nursing commonsense.

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh: 一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en: This training is designated to help students establishcommunicative skills through natural and authentic English,contextualized in lively, interesting situations related tostudents' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important featuresof English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providingstudents with a wide range of useful conversationalexpressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in classdiscussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 使學生認知測量是各項工程建設的一項重要基礎性先行的工作，使能適應各項測量外業觀測、內業計算及繪圖等作業。課程概要如下：1)測量之基本概念、(2)各種測量儀器的認識與使用、(3)控制測量（括三角、三邊導線高程等)之施測方法及計算、(4)地形圖及地籍圖之測及應用、(5)各項工程放樣測量。
description.en: Theory and practice with compass,transit,level,and stadia.Computations of area,earthwork volumes,and horizontal and vertical curves;astronomical observations;boundary surveying;and map plotting.

description.zh: 配合測量學之講授，作相互之印證，以期融會貫通，落實提昇測量教學之效果。課程概要：(1)各項儀器之使用實習、(2)距離、高程、角度測量實習、(3)控制測量實習、(4) 地形測量實習、(5) 定線實習。
description.en: Theory and practice with compass,transit,level,and stadia.Computations of area,earthwork volumes,and horizontal and vertical curves;astronomical observations;boundary surveying;and map plotting.

description.zh: 課程中許多問題與工程應用有直接關係，此一形式為使學生摩擬實際情況，並減少物理性的描述，授課內容如下：(1)緒論、(2)量力學、(3)質點平衡、(4)力系合成、(5)剛體之平衡、(6)結構分析、(7)內、(8)摩擦、(9)重心與質心、(10)慣性矩、(11)虛功原理。
description.en: Engineering applications of equilibrium of forces.Vector operations,couple and moment of force,resultants,center of gravity and center of pressure,static friction,free body diagrams,equilibrium,trusses and frames.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是為了：1.驗證物理理論之真實性，2.培養同學認真的科學態度與方法，3.培養同學數據處理的能力，4.啟發同學自行設計解決量度問題的方法。課程之施行分為上下兩學期，每一學期為一學分三小時。上學期的內容偏重力學、波動、熱力、流力之實驗，下學期的內容則偏重電磁、光學、近物之實驗。
description.en: In this course there will be 1 credit for each of two semesters, and 3 laboraborial hours per week. The first semester experiments involve mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, and waves, etc.. The second semester experiments contains electromagnetics, optics, and modern physics, etc.. The purposes of this course are 1: to identify the physical laws, 2:to cultivate the ability of data reduction of students, 4: to instruct the students solving the problems of measurements of measurements by self-designments.

description.zh: 工程地質對於工程結構物之規劃、設計、施工、維護等均有重要關係。本課程內容包括：(1)地質調查、(2)岩石之風化及其性質、(3)地下探查、(4)地球物理探測、(5)邊坡滑動與山坡、(6)建築物、結構物之基礎、(7)公路與鐵路、(8)隧道、(9)壩址地質調查。
description.en: Fundamentals of mineralogy,petrology,sedimentation,stratigraphy,and structural geology needed by environmental scientists tounderstant earth materials.

description.zh: 使學生們習得在紡織與製衣工業上，從國際與歷史觀點來探討目前與未來經營管理上的問題﹝1﹞ 全球紡織與製衣工業的經濟學﹝2﹞ 國內紡織業目前的情況﹝3﹞ 經營策略之演進﹝4﹞ 經營環境分析與其研究﹝5﹞ 國際競爭之策略
description.en: The purpose of this study is provide an international and historical perspective on the situation in the Taiwan's textile and clothing industries and from this perspective on the suggest alternative for its future development. We begin our study of management and discuss the facts that form the foundation for the rest of the study.﹝1﹞ Economics of the global textile and clothing industries.﹝2﹞ The current state of Taiwan's textile industry.﹝3﹞ The evolution of competitive strategies.﹝4﹞ Environment analysis and managerial research.﹝5﹞ Countermeasures for global competition.

name.en: Polymerization and Synthetic Fiber Spinning Lab.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解實驗方法，自己能成功合成纖維。粘液嫘縈之製備、銅氨嫘縈之製備、Nylan66之聚合、Nylan66之界面聚縮合、PVA 薄膜之製備、聚苯乙烯之製備、以粘度法測苯乙烯之MV、PVA 之縮醛化。
description.en: The object of this lab are to learn the skills of polymerization and to synthesize organic fibers successfully.  The course includes the synthesis of viscose rayon, cuprammonium rayon, nylon 66, polyvinylalcohol, polystyrene and interfacial polymerization of nylon66.  This viscosity determination of molecular weight of polystyrene as well as the aldehyde reaction of polyvinylalcohol is also included.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於介紹各種材料之基本原理，化學組成、合成方法及應用上所使用之技術。材料本身將分為有機材料及無機材料，內容包括；半導體材料、光電材料、奈米材料、陶瓷材料、生醫材料等。技術面則包含；沈積技術（CVD、MBE、ALE）、蝕刻技術（wet etching、dry etching、digital etching）、濺鍍法（sputtering）、覆膜法（coating）、溶膠?凝膠法（Sol-Gel）等。
description.en: Introduction to the principles, the molecules structures, the synthetic methods and application of newly developed materials.  This includes organic materials, semiconducting materials, nanomaterials, ceramic materials and biomaterials. The following processing techniques will also be introduced：deposition (CVD、MBE、ALE), etching (wet chemistry and dry chemistry), sputtering , coating and sol-gel methods.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是讓學生對材料電性行為的理論與應用能有清晰完整的認識，第一部份以古典理論觀點來解釋導體、半導體、超導、絕緣體及介電材料；第二部分以近代量子理論解釋金屬半導體及有機共軛分子的能帶理論即能階與能隙之概念；第三部分光電元件實例：發光二極體，光電二極體，場效應電極體，半導體雷射等。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the electronic properties of materials. PartⅠ: using only"classical (pre-quantum)ideas"to introduce the concepts of electrical conductivity, light transmission, index of refraction, dielectric constant.Part Ⅱ: introducing quantum mechanics to elucidate the band theory of metals, semiconductors, and organic conjugated molecules.PartⅢ: few examples of optoelectronic devices, like p-n junction, light-emitting diodes (LEDs), field effect transistors, semiconductor lasers etc.

description.zh: 使學生了解如何減少工業廢物及從治本上減少污染概述工業上（紡織、高分子等）的污染源，並如何從原料管制清潔管理、維護、保養、節用或藥劑最佳利用，分流等，減少工業廢物，另外研討減廢技術的難易，成本和趨勢。
description.en: The topics that were chosen for inclusion in this course are reduction in raw materials usage, reduction in waste quantities, reuse of waste materials, materials and energy recovery.  Direct activities include:waste generation rates, storage, collection, transfer and transport, processing and disposal, and indirect activities include: financing, operations, equipment, personnel, cost accounting and budgeting, are both covered in this course.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 紡織產品之製程甚長，經過各製程之產品均須實施檢驗，以確保品質之正常，為在紡織品生產過程中不可缺少之一環，紡織檢驗學是研討應用在紡織纖維、紡紗、織造、印染整理、製衣過程中各項檢驗之理論與實務，闡述其適用範圍、檢驗設備、檢驗程序、相關標準或規範、檢驗結果，並將所獲得之檢驗結果，發生優劣之原因詳細分析，更進以將各種紡織產品之品質與實用性，其應具備之水準作深入之探討。
description.en: Textile goods are made through a long process. Product of all process must be testing and inspection , that can make sure to have a good quality . So it has attained an importment position in the textile industry. It involves scope, apparatus, procedure. standard or specification and results. Testing and inspection are carried out in order to answer one or more questions. Are the goods satisfactory? Are the goods better or poorer than another lot? What has been the effect of a certain process on the goods? If the goods are unsatisfactory or unusual ,what is the cause of the abnormality. After analyzing these causes and results to get more research and appreciation of product's quality, activity and standard level.

description.zh: 分別就纖維、紗線、織物、成衣，檢驗應具備之特性，並比較各種不同之檢驗方法所得之檢驗結果。學習各種儀器之正確操作方法，及對檢驗結果代表性之判定。
description.en: Textile testing can include the means for determining the properties of a fiber, a yarn, and an apparel.  The data obtained here can be analyzed statistically.  Procedures and operation of testing insturment operations are the most important issue.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是讓學生對於織造工程的原理、流程能充分瞭解與認識。其內容包括絡筒、整經、漿紗等準備工程及梭織、針織等製布工程。涵蓋力織機的主要、次要機構、無梭織機、紗環成形元件、緯編針織與經編針織。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to make students fully understand the theory and process of weaving engineering.  In addition to the winding, warping and slashing processes for the yarn preparation, the syllabus contains the weaving and knitting methods for the fabric construction.  The primary and secondary mechanisms in a power loom, shuttleless looms, loop-forming elements, weft knitting and warp knitting are all mentioned in details.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是讓學生經由實際的操作，以致對織造工程的原理能有更深入的認識。其內容包括：系內實習工廠筒子機、整經機、漿紗機、劍杆式投緯織機、片梭織機、噴水式織機、圓編針織機、織襪機、經編針織機等機器的操作。又為了增進學生對於實務的瞭解，校外工廠參觀亦列入課程中。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to make students further understand the weaving theories through the practical operations.  The students have to learn the operation of the following machines at the workshop in this department.  They are cone winder, warping machine, sizing machine, rapier loom, gripper loom, water-jet loom, circular knitting machine, hosiery knitter and warp-knitting machine.  In order to enhance the students' understanding of weaving processes, the visits to some local weaving mills are also arranged.

description.zh: 紡織工業越來越越電腦化與自動化，現代紡織工廠管理課程內容如下：﹝1﹞ 工廠企劃與系統統計。﹝2﹞ 工廠企劃與管理上之探討：電腦化與自動化。﹝3﹞ 工廠企劃與原料之搬運。﹝4﹞ 電腦輔助設計﹝CDA﹞與電腦輔助製造﹝CAM﹞。﹝5﹞ 線上與線外之製程管理。﹝6﹞ 檢查與品質管理。﹝7﹞ 工業安全之組織與方案。﹝8﹞ 模擬與成本分析。
description.en: As the textile world becomes more and "computerized and automated," the study of textile factory management provides an understanding of various issues in the modern factory where textile products are manufactured. The whole spectrum of factory management issues are as the follows:﹝1﹞ Factory planning and system design.﹝2﹞ Factory planning and management considerations: computerization and automation.﹝3﹞ Factory planning and materials handling.﹝4﹞ Computer-aided design﹝CDA﹞and computer-aided manufacturing﹝CAM﹞.﹝5﹞ On-line and off-line process control.﹝6﹞ Inspection and quality control.﹝7﹞ Industrial safety: need for organizing and planning the program.﹝8﹞ Simulation and cost analysis.

description.zh: 染料發色理論，染料類別與性質，染料中間體，偶氮染料之製備以及分散、反應、直接等染料之結構與性質之介紹與說明。
description.en: It covers the chromophores, Colour Index intermediates and properties of different kinds of dyes.  The details of preparation of azo dyes,disperse dyes and reactive dyes are also described.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解人造纖維之合成方法，逐步聚合及連鎖聚合在高分子纖維上之理論研討。共聚合理論在人造纖維上之應用。人造纖維之結構物性基本理論研討。各種人造纖維及天然纖維之研究包括：嫘縈、亞克力纖維、聚酯、耐龍、彈性纖維、聚烯烴、超細纖維、液晶纖維、棉、羊毛、醋酸纖維。
description.en: The aim of this course is to understand the synthetic method of man-made fibers.  The theoretical foundation of step growth and chain growth mechanism of polymer fiber are elucidated.  Copolymerization theory in fiber application are discussed also.Finally, the structure-properties relationship in fiber science and fiber chemistry will be discussed.  These fibers include Rayon, Acrylics, polyester, nylon, spandex, polyolefin, superfine fiber, liquid crystal polymer, cotton, wool, and acetic fiber.

description.zh: 係利用物理機械整理及化學處理方式，改善紡織品之吸引性、服務性和最終用途之機能性。整理加工技術包括結構穩定性(諸如壓縮、煮呢、蒸呢、熱定型)；表面特性改質(諸如平滑性、粗糙性、光澤性及其他美觀性質)與功能性改質(諸如防縐、防縮、防火、防污、防水、防微生物與昆蟲、耐光、耐冷熱、耐污染質及化學藥劑、耐氣候、耐摩擦、抗起球、抗靜電)。
description.en: The attractiveness, serriceability and end-use performance of textiles are imporved by the application of physical mechanical and chemical processes.  Finishing techniques include dismensional stabilization(such as, sanforization, crabbing, decatizing, heat-setting),modification of surface characteristics(such as, smoothness, roughness, luster, other esthetic fbric qualities) and functional property modification (such as, resistance to wrinkle shrinkage, fire, soils and stains, water, microorganisms and insect, light, heat and cold, air pollutants and chemical agents, weathering, abrasion, pilling and static change).

description.zh: 介紹各類紡織纖維之染色理論與基本染色方法；包括染料應用上之分類與紡織物纖維的類別，一般染色之理論，染色機械之類別，纖維素纖維、蛋白質纖維、聚酯纖維、聚醯胺纖維、聚丙烯睛纖維及其混紡織物的染色原理及應用以及各種纖維染色缺點以及防止與修正缺點之方法。
description.en: Introducing the dyeing theory and dyeing method of various textile fibers; which include the classification of dyestuffs and textile fibers, the dyeing machine, the dyeing theory and dyeing methods of cellulosic fibers, protein fibers, synthetic fibers and their blends, also the cause and correction of dyeing defects.

description.zh: 實際操作各種纖維的染色與各染色機械之應用，其包括標準液之配製及染料溶解之判定，棉及其混紡織物、羊毛及其混紡織物、蠶絲織物、聚酯纖維、尼龍織物、亞克力織物等的染色方法。
description.en: Practising the dyeing method and dyeing machine opertion and application on different forms of fiber; which include standard dyeing solution preparation, the dyeing of cotton, wool, silk, polyester, nylon, acrylic fibers and their blends.

description.zh: 織物整理實習之目的是瞭解和探討各種藥劑實際應用於織物上之效應。實習項目包括棉織物的樹脂、防燃、防污、撥水、撥油、防黴、衛生加工，聚酯織物的熱定性、鹼處理加工，羊毛織物的縮絨及防縮加工。
description.en: The object of textile finishing practice is to understand and discuss the effects of various chemicals applied on the fabrics.  The lab includes resin, flame-resistant, soil-resistant, water-and oil-repellent, rot proofing and hygienic finishes of cotton fabric, heat-setting and alkali treatment of polyester fabric, milling and shrink-resistant finishes of wool fabric.

description.zh: 依各個纖維的理化性，實際習得各種素材的精練，漂白染前處理工程。並對纖維素材的滲透性，雜質去除的功能性（化學藥劑、界面活性劑），織物的白度，纖維物性的影響加以討論。此外與練漂相關的燒毛、退漿，及合成纖維素材的熱定型，鹼減量加工實習的工程條件，效果並加以探討。
description.en: According to the chemical and physical properties of all kinds of fiber, their scouring and bleaching processes before dyeing are practically studied.  The wettibility tests,the  impurity removement of cellulose fiber,the whiteness of fabric and the influence of fiber physics are discussed.  Furthermore, the treatment conditions and effects for relevant processes such as singeing, disizing, presetting for synthetic fiber and weight reduction by alkali are generally discussed.

description.zh: 講述染料與纖維的染色化學及色糊的粘彈性，流變性對印花品質的影響。並說明各種印花方法，直接印花、防遮印花、消色印花，及特殊效果的印花，和印花機的應用。
description.en: The influence of printing quality by dyeing chemistry of dyestuff and fiber and the viscoelasticity and rheology of paste is introduced.  The different printing technology, direct printing; discharge printing; resist printing, special effect printing as well as the application of printing machines is explained.

description.zh: 以染料與纖維間的染色化學為基礎，選擇適當粘彈性色糊，實際習得各種印花各種印花的方法。並對印花工程中發色值(K/S)的高低，色糊的尖銳性，脫糊性及浸透性加以探討。
description.en: Based on dyeing chemistry of dyestuff and fiber, selected paste with proper viscoelasticity is used to exercise various  printing technologies.  The color depth, sharpness of paste; thickener removement and penetration of wettibility are also discussed.

description.zh: 研究複合材料原理及應用，複合材料之高分子科學，預浸料，模壓料，壓力釜成型與真空袋技術，繞線成型，編織成型，熱可塑複合材料，拉擠成型及複合材料力學及應用。
description.en: The aim of this course is to learn the principle of composite and its application.  Several composite processing methods are included.They are prepregs, molding compounds, autoclave and vaccum bag method.  Filament winding, braiding, thermoplastic composite, pultrusion are also included.  Finally, mechanic of composite and its application are discussed in detaile.

description.zh: 使學生對無梭織機與有梭織機在準備工程與織布工程中，異同之處的以瞭解，並對各工程之目的、機械作用、技術重點、產量計算、生產管理等得以瞭解。對紗布之結構理論加以研習，將有助於織物設計之基礎應用。
description.en: For students to understand the difference in preparation and weaving processes between automatic looms and shuttles weaving machines. The objects for each process, interaction of mechanism, key points of technology, production calculation and production management are also mentioned. The study for structure theory of fiber and fabric is considered helpful for the fundamental application in fabric design.

description.zh: 教授化學儀器分析原理、應用、儀器裝置及限制,準確度等。內容有紅、可見、紫外、X光 、核磁共振光譜、表面分析之電子質譜方法、熱分析以及不同的分析方法如  、液體層析等。
description.en: This text will introduce the fundamental principles and  Applications of modern Analytical instruments.Measuring devices, limitations of measurements in terms of sensitivity and accuracy will also be taught. The contents are infrared, visible, ultraviolet, X-ray and nuclear magnetic spectroscopes, Analysis of sur-faces with electron beams and mass spectrometry, thermal methods and chromatography and related separation methods.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en: This training is designated to help students establishcommunicative skills through natural and authentic English,contextualized in lively, interesting situations related tostudents' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important featuresof English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providingstudents with a wide range of useful conversationalexpressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in classdiscussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 大二下學期為軍訓（四）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：中外戰史－－選擇近代中外著名戰爭，剖析其發生原因、作戰經過、成敗得失之關鍵因素，以及其對國家民族前途之影響，使學生從認識戰爭中吸取歷史經驗與教訓，進而體認戰爭勝敗對國家民族存亡發展息息相關，激發愛國情操。軍略地理－－使學生透過地略知識，了解國防地理因素與國家戰略之關係，並體認國防軍事建設之建軍備戰作為。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。模糊對局理論與兵棋推演－－該理論在協助指揮官在作戰判斷時能更具體化分析敵我狀況，以利草擬作戰計劃及下達決心。心戰謀略－－藉由研究波斯灣戰爭中的心戰措施，以了解平時或戰時的心戰與宣傳技巧。新世代領導－－介紹當代頗具聲望的領導人，以期學者能效法他們的風範及應用其經驗與技巧於日常生活中。
description.en: Military Training includes three courses at the second semester of second year. They are The History of Wars, The Military Strategy of Geography, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of them. The History of Wars analyzes details of war and what it can bring to nation and her people. The Military Strategy of Geography tells the importance of geography in war and how the geography influences the making of strategy. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind. The theory is to help commander precisely analyze the battlefield situation and then draft war plan and make decision. Sychological warfare strategy－By researching the sychological warfare during gulf war. We can make clear conception about sychological war and propaganda skill during war or peacetime. X,Y,Z generation leadership introduce contemplate celebrities who have good reputation on leadership in the hope that learner can emulate their leadership cha

description.zh: 討論各種纖維之化學組成、合成與成形之理論，同時針對纖維之性質、纖維改質與組成、合成、成形之關係與影響因素加以講授。
description.en: A major object of this course is to provide a background in fiber compositions, synthesis, spinning and characterization.  A second goal is to introduce factors that influence fiber compositions, formation and properties.

description.zh: 內容包括：纖維溶解性質，酸鹼性質，纖維改質，纖維鑑定（分子量、元素等）。
description.en: The material in this course covers solubility tests of fibers, modification of fibers, characterization of fibers and synthesis of polymers.

description.zh: 纖維之形態、表面特性、密度、光學性質、膨潤性、熱的性質，變形與流動，力學性質、緩和現象，摩擦現象等物理性質及機械性質，使實際應用在紡織工程上。
description.en: (1) Chemical structure of Polymer Fibers.(2) Microstructure and Macrostructure of Fibers. (3) Staple Fiber Length and Sampling.(4) Fiber-cross-Section and Linear Density.(5) Fiber Mechanical Properties.(6) Fiber Optical Properties.(7) Fiber Thermal Properties.(8) Fiber Viscoelasticity.

description.zh: 內容包括纖維物性鑑別，吸濕及膨潤，纖維長度，細度及密度，應力應變曲線，彎曲剛性及扭力，牽伸與緩和，摩擦現象，玻璃轉移點，熱收縮及定型，複折射率。
description.en: (1) Fiber Characterization by Optical Microscopy.(2) Fiber Absorption.(3) Fiber Length.(4) Fiber Denier and Density.(5) Mechanical Test-Tensile Test. (6) Fiber Abrasion Test.(7) DSC Test.(8) TGA Test.(9) TMA Test.(10) Birefringence Test.

description.zh: 棉系紡紗學實習為介紹有關製造紡織用紗與工業用紗之製造原理、技術與流程之實用課程。在此課程中提供了有關於紡紗機械之實際操作，其包括有清花機、梳棉機、條卷機、帶卷機、精梳機、併條機、粗紗機、細紗機與落筒機等。甚而對纖維與紗形成階段間之相互關係可有更廣泛之瞭解，及有關於他們特性的評價方法。
description.en: The course is designed to introduce a practical course in the principles,techique and spinning processes involved in the texile yarns and industrial yarns manufacturing.This course will provide the practical operation for spinning machines involved in scutching machine,carding machine, sliver lap machine,ribbon lap machine,combing machine,  drawing machine , roving machine and spinning  machine, and winding machine etc. A comprehensive understanding of the inter-relationships of the yarn and fiber forming stages as related to their evaluation is developed.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是讓學生對於紡紗技術的理論與應用能有清晰完整的認識，內容函蓋工程管理、保全管理、運轉管理並以品質管制為目標。清花工程、梳棉工程、併條工程、精梳工程、粗紡工程、環錠式精紡工程、噴氣式精紡機、開端式精紡工程、自動絡筒工程及混紡技術均詳加說明。又為配合近代紡織科技之進步亦介紹新近國內外新型自動化之紡紗機械及技術資料。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide students with a clear and through presentation of the theory and applications of short staple spinning. Aspects overed include engineering management , maintenance management, productive management quality control. The opening, carding, doubling, combing, roving, ring-spinning, air-jet spinning, O.E spinning, Auto-conning and blending are all  in detail. The latest technology and machinery for automation of spinning are also introduced in this course.

description.zh: 設計：以經緯紗交錯原理，組成各種織紋，分為單層組織，特殊結構組織，雙層組織、毛圈組織、毛絨組織等。分析：織品中纖維成分分析法，經緯紗之測定法，經緯密度配置原理、布重、經緯密度、紗支粗細等之關係，織品結構之分析等。
description.en: Design: With the principle of warps and wefts crossed each other, fabrics are formed in various structure, such as single cloth, double cloth, pile fabric, velvet, etc. Analysis: The method of material analysis, the cover factor of the warp or weft, the principle of arranging warps and wefts related to fabric weight, density, fineness of the warp or weft, structure, etc.

name.en: Woven Fabric Design and Analysis Lab.

description.zh: 含五單元：1.試驗各種基礎織物結構之配置結果。2.試驗特殊穿綜，紋板序對織品表現與技巧。3.試驗空筘齒對織品之表現與技巧。4.試驗構成經緯紗彎曲之技巧。5.試驗特殊材料對織品之表現與技巧。
description.en: Includes five units:1.Test the arrangement of fabric structure units.2.Test special drafting and pagging on analysed weaves to study the technic of weaving.3.Test the effect of using some empty dents to design hollow fabrics.4.Test the design technic of the bending of warps and wefts.5.Test the effect and technic of using special material to design fabrics.

description.zh: 各種有機化合物之檢驗以及常見有機化學反應之實習。
description.en: It covers the testings and preperations of common organic compounds.

description.zh: 本課程是為不具化學及化工背景的紡織工程的同學所設計。主要是講授一些基本的有機化學原理、化學品的結構式與命名，以及重要的反應械構。同為係一學期的課程，所以偏重脂肪族與芳香族的介紹。
description.en: This lecture is designed to serve those students in textile engineering and mechanical engineering who must acquire a working knowledge of organic chemistry but do notneed all the detial of the traditional full-year course . Aone-semester course in this field can illustrate the fundamental principles of chemistry,of the structure and nomenclature of matter,and of the factors which govern molecular behavior. The theory and mechanisms of certain reactions have been introduced, especially when it was thought that these might be helpful in explaining to the curious student the "why" of organic chemistry.

description.zh: 由於紡織品進口之突增使紡織生產基礎繼續惡化，對國內紡織工業為十分嚴重之挑戰。國內紡織公司逐漸的在強調電腦輔助設計與電腦輔助製造科技之導入。此以電腦科技為基本之課程包括有：1.利用電腦輔助設計與電腦輔助製造之技術，以降低產品開發與設計週期之時間且減少導入新產品至市場之時間。2.採用類比數位與傳輸技術針對纖維製品的自動測試系統以降低測試時間。3.以電腦輔助設計與電腦輔助製造之技術為市場工具之潛在用途，及紡織製造商與零售商間之電子繪圖傳輸。4.選用適當的感測器以協助生產管制與增進製造效率。
description.en: The continue erosion of the textile production base in the world caused by increased import, is a serious challenge for the domestic textile industry. Progressive domestic companies are now placing greater emphasic on the introduction of computer aided design and computer aided manufacture. This computer base technology includes:1.The product development cycle using CAD/CAM techniques to reduse the time involved in  designing and introducing new products to the marketplace.2.The automatic testing or measuring system for textile products using analog digital and communication technologies to reduce testing time.3.The potentail use of CAD/CAM as a marking  tool and the potential for electionic graphics communication between textile manufacturer and retailer will also be discussed.4.To slect the suitable sensors to assist process control and increase manufacturing efficiency.

description.zh: 如何行現代化紡織工廠管理內容包括：自動化、電腦輔助設計、電腦輔助製造以提高生產效率及降低成本，並且了解台灣紡織與製衣工業外銷情況，世界市場紡織品之行銷策略，如何突破外銷瓶頸，如何生產附加價值高之紡織品以適合市場之需要。
description.en: Achieving excellence and profitability throughout your organization is the most important issue facing textile industry in the global competition.  The study covers:--Introduce flexible manufacturing system in order to be able to handle small batch production which include automation, CAD and CAM.--The current situation in Taiwan's textile export and factors behind the marketing success.--The competitive strategies in the global textile market.--Quick response to customer requirements: New technologies to reduce labor costs and to enhance the speed and flexibility which Taiwan's textile industry can initiate and respond to fashion changes.

description.zh: 本課程乃針對紡絲過程中，無論在熔融紡絲、溼式紡絲或乾式紡絲中，所遇到有關流力之問題，做一綜合性之整理。其主要內容包括：(1)理想流體(2)牛頓流體(3)Navier-Stokes公式導證(4)高黏度流體(5)邊界層流體(6)可壓縮流體(7)高分子黏彈體(8)擾流之概述。
description.en: This course is aimed at solving the fluid problems occurredin melt spinning,wet spinning,and dry spinning.With the knowledges in classical fluid mechanics,many problems associated with spinning can be solved.The main topics in this course includes(1)Ideal flow(2)Newtonian Fluid(3)Navier-stokes equation   (4)High viscouse fluid(5)Boundary layer flow(6)Incompressible fluid (7)Polymer rheology(8) Turbulent fluid.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 大一下學期為軍訓（二）零學分，概述如下： 領導統御－－使學生了解領導統御之原則、要領、方法及群眾心理，增進領導統御能力，以期在未來事業上，能發揮人性潛能，激勵團隊精神，提高工作效率。海軍概要－－使學生了解海軍沿革及海權之重要性、海軍任務、海軍組織、海軍各類型作戰及未來發展，增進對海軍之認識。空軍概要－－使學生了結解空軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、作戰、後勤及未來發展，以增進對空軍之認識。大一女生軍訓課程包括護理與健康，概述如下：護理與健康－－使學生瞭解人生過程中如何實現一個健康的生活；在社會多變複雜的環境下如何自我調適、化解工作壓力、求取心理的平衡；在日益開放兩性交往如何約制一些不正常的行為，以及了解對各種疾病的預防等諸般護理常識，以促進身心健康幸福人生。進而在戰時支援國防以達強國強種之目的。
description.en: The topics of military training during the second semester. The skill of leadership—is designed to make student understand the principles and methods of leadership that will benefit to individuals careers. The introduction of Navy—focus on NAVY's history, task, character, organization and the future development. The introduction of Air Forces—makes students to better understand the Air Force's history, task, trait, organization, education, operation, logistics and future development. The female military training during the second semester are nursing and health. These courses are to teach how to live a healthy life; and cultivate the ability of self-adjustment, releasing pressure and balancing mind. Furthermore, it focus on how to curb abnormal behaviors, and how to prevent diseases and nursing commonsense.

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh: 一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en: This training is designated to help students establishcommunicative skills through natural and authentic English,contextualized in lively, interesting situations related tostudents' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important featuresof English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providingstudents with a wide range of useful conversationalexpressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in classdiscussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。內容包括民族、社會、文化精神，中國歷代政治得失之分析，中國農業經濟之特性，歷代考選、財賦、土地制度之變遷。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生除通盤瞭解中國歷史精神與特性外，並能具有獨立分析問題之能力。
description.en: This course is comprised of two parts: introduction to the development of the Chinese history and studies on special topics of Chinese history.  Major topics includes ethnical, social, and cultural problems; the advantages and disadvantages of the political policies of different dynasties; the characteristics of the agricultural economy in the history of China; the evolution of civil service examination systems, of financial structures, and of land policies.  Class activities include lectures and discussions.  Students are also expected to make oral and written reports so that they may have not only a comprehensive understanding of the essence of Chinese history, but also the ability of independent thinking and analysis.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

description.zh: 本課程從物理的觀點談述分子材料。內容包括如下主題：1.	力學2.	電學3.	光學4.	磁學5.	生物物理
description.en: This course introduces molecular materials from physics point of view.It will cover the following topics：1. Mechanics 2. Electronics3. Photonics4. Magnetics5. Biophysics

description.zh: 操作與分子物理相關的實驗
description.en: It covers the fundamental experiments in molecular physics.

description.zh: 本課程從分子化學的觀點談述分子材料。其中包括原子結構及分子結構，基礎高分子化學，生物化學。
description.en: This course introduces molecular materials from chemistry point of view.  It covers the following topics: structures of atoms and molecules, polymer molecules, and biochemistry.

description.zh: 操作化學相關的實驗
description.en: It covers the fundamental experiments in chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程的教學目的在於期望同學能具備相當的製圖與識圖的能力，其內容包含基本圖學概念、傳統正投影圖學及基本機械製圖概念。
description.en: The object of this course is to make students capable of making and understanding the engineering drawing. The contents of text are Fundamental drawing concepts, systems of projection, views on drawings, sections and sectional views, conventional representations, principles of dimensioning, methods of dimensioning common features.

description.zh: 本課程主要討論基本統計學與工程統計在紡織工業上之應用。其課程內容包括有統計資料之量測，統計資料之敘述，機率，隨機變數之分佈，非連續性機率分佈，參數評估，假說之測試，管制圖，迴歸及相關，變異數分析及如何使用統計套裝軟體均被包括於此課程中。
description.en: This course is concerned with the study of the basic statistics and engineering statistical applications in textile industries.  The materials in this course, including statistical measures of data, statistical description of data, probability, distributions of random variables, discrete probability distributions, estimation of parameters, tests of hypotheses, control chart, regression and correlation, analysis of variance and how to use the statistical application software will be covered.

description.zh: 介紹計算機基本架構，硬體，軟體，程式設計，Algorithms及組合語言程式。
description.en: This course will focus on: basic structure of computer; applied; software﹝Office97, Lotus123…﹞; program design; algorithms and visual basic program.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 應用先進的電子零件與材料，並配合量測技術的演進，介紹電子儀表的功能，規格與測試方法，內容包含：1.量測原理：量測系統，信號特性，感測器，2.資料分析：設差值，精確度，解析度，統計分析，3.標準與校準：工業標準與校準原理，4.基本量測電路，5.基本儀表，電表，示波器，信號產生器，信號分析儀器，6.工業電子儀表：溫度，壓力，速度，光源之量測分析控制，7.自動量測系統，8.生化儀器。
description.en: 1.Principles of measurement2.Analysis of data3.Standard and calibration4.Basic measurement circuit5.Basic instrumentation 6.Industrial electronic instrumentation7.Automatic measurements systems8.IEEE-488 GPIB instruments

description.zh: 1.轉移函數，方塊圖，信號流程圖2.物理系統之數學模式3.線性控制系統之穩定度4.控制系統之時域分析5.根軌跡法6.頻域分析7.控制系統設計
description.en: 1.Transfer Function,Block Diagrams,Signal-Flow Graphs2.Mathematical Modeling of phsical systems3.Stability of Linear Control Systems4.Time-Domain Analysis of Control Systems5.Root-Locus Technique6.Frequency-Domain Analysis7.Design of control systems

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。

With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 在本課程中,我們將邀請產,官,學,研界人士,對電子,電機,電腦,通訊等相關議題,作深入而精闢之演講
description.en: In this course,we will intive outstanding professional persons to address lectures on various technical fields covering electronics,electicity,computer ,communication etc.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括邏輯閘的特性與功能測試，能利用積體電路完成各種基礎邏輯電路的組裝及設計，並能利用電子儀器進行量測、檢修。探討最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之VLSI設計，使用MSI與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI之設計與測試技巧，各種CAD軟體工具介紹。基礎邏輯閘實驗、組合邏輯實驗、加法器及減法器實驗、組合邏輯應用實驗、正反器邏輯實驗、循序邏輯電路應用實驗。
description.en: 1.Properties and function tests of logic gates. 2. Implementations of and designs of basic logic circuits using ICs. 3.Algorithms for the optimization of combinational logic circuits. 4.Programmable logic devices. 5.VLSI design of combinational logic circuits. 6.Multi-layer logic circuits using MSI and standard circuit  elements. 7.Gate array design. 8.Sequential Logic components. 9.Analysis and synthesis of sequential Logic circuits. 10. Technologies of VLSI design and test. 11. CAD software tools. 12.Basic logic gate experiments. 13.Combinational logic experiments. 14. Adder and subtractor experiments. 15. Combinational logic application experiments. 16. Flip-flop experiments. 17. Sequential circuit application experiments.

description.zh: 1.發展歷史與演進2.程序觀念3.非同步平行程序4.死結及無限等待5.主記憶體管理6.虛擬記憶體結構與管理7.處理器排程8.磁碟管理9.網路及系統安全
description.en: 1.History and evolution 2.Process concepts3.ASynchronous concurrent processes4.Desdlock and indefinite postponrmrnt5.Real storage management6.Virtual storage organization and management 7.Processor scheduling 8.Disk mansgement9.Network and security

description.zh: 1. 簡介；2. 組合邏輯系統設計；3. 標準組合邏輯模組；4. 算術組合模組與網路；5. 順序邏輯系統設計；6. 標準順序邏輯模組；7. RTL系統；8. 資料及控制子系統；9. 微處理器設計。10.數位系統設計之原則與方法；11. ASM (Algorithm StateMachine) Chart 之應用與序向邏輯方法：傳統式合成法、多工器控制法、One-Hot 法、ROM-Based 法；12. ASIC所需之基本 SSI/MSI 元件；13.使用 SSI/MSI 基本元件解決邏輯問題；14.採用數位系統設計之原理與方法，利用 ASIC之基本元件，再配合基本閘設計 ALU、CPU 控制器、中斷控制器、DMA 控制器等 IC 元件；15.Bit-Slice 計算機設計；16.微程式設計；17.Hardwired CPU 設計。
description.en: 1. Introduction; 2. Design of combinational systems; 3. Standard combinational modules; 4. Arithmetic combinational modules and networks5. Design of sequential network; 6. Standard sequential network; 7. Register transfer level (RTL) systems; 8. Data and control subsystems; 9. Design of a microcomputer; 7.Principles of digital system design; 8.ASM chart 9.SSI/MSI component 10.Application of ASIC component 11.Bit-Slice machine 12.Hardwared CPU design.

description.zh: 1.時變電磁場之介紹;2.平面電磁波;3.傳輸線之理論及應用;4.導波管與共振腔;5.天線與輻射系統。
description.en: 1.Introduction to Time-Varying Fields;2.Plane Electromagnetic Waves;3.Theory and Applications of Transmission Lines;4.Waveguides and Resonators;5.Antennas and Radiating Systems.

description.zh: 1.簡介：概觀、資訊源、通道、通訊品質、數位通訊系統2.信號與系統：傅立葉轉換、線性系統3.類比數位變換：取樣、量化、脈碼調變4.機率與隨機程序5.基頻脈波傳送：相配濾波器、信號間干擾與脈波塑型、等化6.數位通頻傳輸：ASK,PSK,QPSK,DPSK,FSK,QAM,MSK7.多工與展頻技術：分頻多工、分時多工、直序列與跳頻分碼多工8.源編碼：熵、資料緊縮、霍夫曼編碼、資料壓縮、JPEG9.通道編碼：線性區塊碼、迴旋碼
description.en: 1.introduction :overview,information sources,channels,quality measurement,a closer look of modern digital communication systems2.Signals and Systems:Fourier transform,linear systems3.A/D Conversion :sampling ,quantization ,PCM4.Probability and Random Process5.Baseband Pulse Transmission :matched filters,ISI and shaping ,qeualization6.Digital Passband Transmisson:ASK,PSK,QPSK,DPSK,FSK,QAM,MAK7.Multiplexing and Spread Sprctrum   Techniques:FDMA,TDMA,direct sequence and frequency hopping   CDMA8.Source Coding:entropy ,data compaction,Huffman coding,data   compression,JPEG9.Channel Coding :linear block codes,convolutional codes

description.zh: 1.積體電路的分類，2.積體電路晶片設計的流程，3.CMOS元件的基本結構與佈局，4.CMOS元件的設計規範技術，5.CMOS元件組成各種數位電路，6.以高階方法探討積體電路之設計，7.系統分割，8.設計問題之探討，9.IC的構造， 10.設計方法，11.時序問題之探討，12.鐘脈問題之探討，13.VLSI之測試，14.有助於設計與測試的結構化技巧探討，15.專題製作。
description.en: 1.Classification of VLSI circuit 2.Flow of VLSI design 3.VLSI characterization 4.CMOS design methods5.CMOS digital circuit 6.High-level VLSI design7.System partiton 8.Time squence9.Clock10.VLSI testing 11.Special projects

description.zh: 1.簡介2.實体－關係模式3.關聯式模式4.關聯式商用查詢語言5.關聯式資料庫設計6.個體導向模式7.擴展之關聯式系統
description.en: 1.Introduction2.Entity-Relationship Model3.Relational Model4.Relational Commercial Language5.Relational Database Design6.Objest-Oriented Model7.Extended Relational Systems

description.zh: 認識高頻電子電路動作原理並建立高頻電子電路設計能力，1.傳輸線原理，2.高頻元件，3.散射參數，4.史密斯圖應用，5.小信號放大器，6.低雜訊放大器，7.射頻放大器，8.振盪器，9.混波與檢波，10.功率分／合器。
description.en: 1.Transmission lineas2.High frequency component3.Scattering parameter4.Smith chart application 5.Small signal amplifier6.Low nosie amplifier7.RF amplifier8.Oscillator9.Mixers and detectors10.Power combiner/spitter

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en: This training is designated to help students establishcommunicative skills through natural and authentic English,contextualized in lively, interesting situations related tostudents' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important featuresof English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providingstudents with a wide range of useful conversationalexpressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in classdiscussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。內容包括民族、社會、文化精神，中國歷代政治得失之分析，中國農業經濟之特性，歷代考選、財賦、土地制度之變遷。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生除通盤瞭解中國歷史精神與特性外，並能具有獨立分析問題之能力。
description.en: This course is comprised of two parts: introduction to the development of the Chinese history and studies on special topics of Chinese history.  Major topics includes ethnical, social, and cultural problems; the advantages and disadvantages of the political policies of different dynasties; the characteristics of the agricultural economy in the history of China; the evolution of civil service examination systems, of financial structures, and of land policies.  Class activities include lectures and discussions.  Students are also expected to make oral and written reports so that they may have not only a comprehensive understanding of the essence of Chinese history, but also the ability of independent thinking and analysis.

description.zh: 大二下學期為軍訓（四）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：中外戰史－－選擇近代中外著名戰爭，剖析其發生原因、作戰經過、成敗得失之關鍵因素，以及其對國家民族前途之影響，使學生從認識戰爭中吸取歷史經驗與教訓，進而體認戰爭勝敗對國家民族存亡發展息息相關，激發愛國情操。軍略地理－－使學生透過地略知識，了解國防地理因素與國家戰略之關係，並體認國防軍事建設之建軍備戰作為。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。模糊對局理論與兵棋推演－－該理論在協助指揮官在作戰判斷時能更具體化分析敵我狀況，以利草擬作戰計劃及下達決心。心戰謀略－－藉由研究波斯灣戰爭中的心戰措施，以了解平時或戰時的心戰與宣傳技巧。新世代領導－－介紹當代頗具聲望的領導人，以期學者能效法他們的風範及應用其經驗與技巧於日常生活中。
description.en: Military Training includes three courses at the second semester of second year. They are The History of Wars, The Military Strategy of Geography, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of them. The History of Wars analyzes details of war and what it can bring to nation and her people. The Military Strategy of Geography tells the importance of geography in war and how the geography influences the making of strategy. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind. The theory is to help commander precisely analyze the battlefield situation and then draft war plan and make decision. Sychological warfare strategy－By researching the sychological warfare during gulf war. We can make clear conception about sychological war and propaganda skill during war or peacetime. X,Y,Z generation leadership introduce contemplate celebrities who have good reputation on leadership in the hope that learner can emulate their leadership cha

description.zh: 介紹電子零組件之組成，特性以及其應用，使學生具有實用電路之分析模擬與設計應用之能力，內容涵蓋：1.半導体物理，2.基本主動元件(二極体，雙極性電晶体，場效電晶体)，3.放大器電路，4.邏輯(數位)電路，5.積体電路。
description.en: 1.Semiconductor physics2.Diode 3.Bipolar Junction transistor4.Field-efferct 5.Operatonal amplifier6.Digital logic circuit7.Integrated circuit

description.zh: (1)半導體二極體特性曲線; (2)半導體二極體之應用:整流器,濾波器,剪波器,箝位器,倍壓器; (3)發光二極體驅動電路; (4)齊納二極體穩壓電路; (5)雙極接合面電晶體之辨別與參數量測; (6)雙極接合面電晶體輸入及輸出特性曲線; (7)雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路; (8)共射極放大電路; (9)射極隨耦電路; (10)共基極定電流源電路; (11)場效電晶體之辨別與參數量測; (12)場效電晶體轉移及輸出特性曲線; (13)場效電晶體直流偏壓電路; (14)場效電晶體放大電路; (15)整流及濾波電路; (16)偏壓分析與設計; (17)基本放大器(共射，共基，共集模式，共源，共汲，共閘等); (18)串級放大器; (19)差動放大器。
description.en: (1)The characteristic curve of PN diode; (2)The applications of PN diode : Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (3)Light Emitting Diode drivers; (4)Zener diode for voltage regulation; (5)The identification of BJT's leads and the measurement of b parameter; (6)The input and output characteristic curves of BJTs; (7)DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (8)Common-Emitter(CE) amplifiers; (9)Emitter-follower(EF) circuits; (10)Common-Base(CB) constant current sources; (11)The identification of FET's leads and the measurement of device parameters; (12)The transfer and output characteristic curves of FETs; (13)DC biasing circuits for FETs; (14)The amplifying circuits of FETs; (15)Retifier circuit and Filter; (16)Bias analysis and design; (17)Common Emitter amplifier, Common base amplifier, Common collector amplifier; (18)Differential amplifier.

description.zh: 瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1.常微分方程式之特殊解法，2.傅立葉(Fourier)級數及轉換，3.矩陣代數，4.偏微分方程式，5.數值方法，6.複變函數。
description.en: 1.Special functions for solving ordinary differential   equetions2.Fourier seriesand transformation3.Matrix and linear algebra4.Partial differential equations5.Numerical methods6.Complex variables

description.zh: 瞭解程式語言所常用之各種資結構，１.抽象資料類別及運算複雜度之概念，２.靜態結構及其儲存法，３.遞迴、堆疊、前序、中序、後序運算式，４.佇列，５.串列、鏈結串列，６.樹、二元樹、平衡樹、堆積，７.圖形，８.排序，９.搜尋、雜湊。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data  structures commonly used in programming languages, including: (1) the concept of ADT (abstract data type) and computational complexity, (2) static structures and their storage representations , (3) recursion, stacks, and prefix, infix, and posfix expressions, (4) queues, (5) lists and linked lists, (6) trees, binary trees, height balanced trees, and heaps,  (7) graphs, (8) soring, and (9) searching and hashing.

description.zh: 1.資料表示法：定點系統(Fixed Point System)，浮點系統(Floating Point System)，2.運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3.指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計(Hardwired Control)，微程式控制單元設計(Microprogramming)，4.記憶系統：記憶體之層次(Memory Hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統(Virtualmemory)，快速記憶(Cache Memory)。
description.en: 1.Data representation 2.Logic operations3.Command and control4.Memory organization5.Processor organization

description.zh: 本課程將結合理論與實務，期使同學不但對光電科技有一個基礎的認識，也具有實作方面的經驗，以作為將來繼續研修光電其它課程的基礎。內容包括：１.光電概論２.基礎光電子學３.雷射光電實習４.光電應用專題研究５.半導体雷射６.發光二極体７.液晶顯示元件８.光感測器９.光纖元件１０.光電實習
description.en: Course content1.Introduction 2.Optics Review3.Basic optoelectronic 4.Electro-optics practics5.special Topic in Electro-optic Technology Application 6.semiconductor Lsaer7.Light Emitting Diode 8.Liquid Crystal Display 9.Fiberand optics communication10.Electro-optic Practices

description.zh: 瞭解線性與非線性電路的組成與分析法，內容包含：1. 交流激勵電路：交流穩態分析，功率計算及相電路，2. 三相電路：Ｙ與△型轉換及功率分析，3. 變壓器電路：互感應及電壓電流的變換，4. 頻率響應分析：極點與零點，轉移函數，5. Fourier 級數，轉換及應用，6. Laplace轉換及應用。
description.en: The course covers the synthesis and analysis of bath linear and nonlinear circuits.Contents include:1.AC circuit :AC steady-state analysis,phasor analysis2.Three phase circuits3.Transformer circuits4.Frequency response 5.Fourier series,Fourier transformation and application6.Laplace transformation and application

description.zh: 1.集合,序列與函數2.基礎邏輯3.關聯式4.計數（排列,組合）5.圖與樹（基礎圖論）6.遞迴式與演算法7.有向圖
description.en: 1.Sets Sequences and Function2.Elementary Logic3.Relations4.Counting5.Graph and Tree6.Recursion Trees and Algorithms7.Digraphs

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en: This training is designated to help students establishcommunicative skills through natural and authentic English,contextualized in lively, interesting situations related tostudents' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important featuresof English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providingstudents with a wide range of useful conversationalexpressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in classdiscussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。內容包括民族、社會、文化精神，中國歷代政治得失之分析，中國農業經濟之特性，歷代考選、財賦、土地制度之變遷。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生除通盤瞭解中國歷史精神與特性外，並能具有獨立分析問題之能力。
description.en: This course is comprised of two parts: introduction to the development of the Chinese history and studies on special topics of Chinese history.  Major topics includes ethnical, social, and cultural problems; the advantages and disadvantages of the political policies of different dynasties; the characteristics of the agricultural economy in the history of China; the evolution of civil service examination systems, of financial structures, and of land policies.  Class activities include lectures and discussions.  Students are also expected to make oral and written reports so that they may have not only a comprehensive understanding of the essence of Chinese history, but also the ability of independent thinking and analysis.
