This course includes human resources analysis, strategy and targets, the access, development and reward of supportive operations, and the maintenance of human resources.

description.en: Scheduling is strategic.A schcduling system dynamically makes decisions about matching activities and resources is order to finish jobs and projects needing these activities in a timely and high-quality fashion while simultaneously maximizing throughput and minimizing direct operating costs.Topics on sequencing,timing/release,routing,resouree reconfiguration,activity reconfiguration,and supporting MIS are included.

description.zh: 本課程在於使同學瞭解管理思想的演進，與管理有關之重要理論，以及未來管理之發展趨勢。課程主要內容包括：組織與管理、管理哲學、管理思想的演進、管理功能（規畫、領導、組織、控制、評估）、溝通、組織成長與改變、未來之管理、個案研討。
description.en: This course will cover the progress of management, the theories of management and the future of management. It consists of 1. Organization and management. 2. Philosophies of management. 3. The function of management. 4. Communication. 5. The future of management. 6. Case studies.

description.zh: 以矩陣的表示法介紹迴歸的模式，其內容包括： ‧簡單線性迴歸-簡單線性迴歸模式，估計子的推論，模式的診斷 和估計子的同步推論 ‧一般線性迴歸 ‧變異數分析與迴歸模式 ‧案例討論
description.en: Use matrix approach to introduced the regression model which includes： 1.Simple Linear Regression--Simple Linear Regression model, Inferences of estimators in regression models, Diagnostics and simultaneous Inferences. 2.General Linear Regression 3.Analysis of Variance and Regression Analysis 4.Case study

description.zh: 此課程將介紹各種實驗之配置法及統計分析方法和結論，其中包括：一因子實驗 ‧區集和拉丁方格 ‧不完全區集設計 ‧多因子實驗 ‧部份因子實驗 ‧巢狀或階層實驗 ‧變異數分析 ‧迴歸分析 ‧交互變異分析
description.en: Introduce the experiment design methods and conclusion. Such as: one factor experiment, Latin square, Multi factors experiment, ANOVA, regression.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。決策支援系統課程在教授資訊分析的技術以輔助管理者制定決策、分析工作計劃、尋找最佳策略的電腦化應用系統，本課程包含下列主題: 電腦化資訊系統、資料收集技術、資料分析技術、系統分析、決策制定與分析、資料庫管理系統、專家系統。
description.en: The objective of this course is to teach undergraduate students the information analysis techniques for making decision and finding good strategies using computer systems. The subjects includes computer information system, data collection, data analysis, system analysis, decision making and analysis, database management, and expert systems.

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

description.zh: 本課程是較大學部的「岩石力學」課程為之深入探討岩石行為的課程，將針對岩石的指數性質、透水性、強度及變形性做更詳細的研究，並將比較岩石和土壤的不同，以及介紹機率概念在岩石力學上的應用。上課時將以研究論文為主，，書籍、報告為輔，其涵蓋的課程內容大致如下：1、岩石的指數性質2、岩石和土壤的不同3、岩體分類法4、岩石的透水性5、立體投影圖6、岩石的強度7、岩石的破壤準則8、岩石的變形性9、弱面的分析10、機率在岩石力學上的應用
description.en: Compared to the undergraduate Rock Mechanics course, this is a more advanced course to examine the behaviors of rocks under different stress conditions。 It will focus on the index properties, the permeability properties, the strength properties, and the deformation properties of rocks。 In addition, it will address the difference between rocks and soils by contrast。 Finally, this course will introduce students to the concept of probability, and how it can be applied to the Rock Mechanics。 The students taking this course will have plenty of reading assignments, and are required to participate in the classroom discussions。

description.zh: 資料庫是任何完整的資訊管理系統之不可或缺的一部份，並且已經在各行各業中顯示其與日俱增的重要性，當然土木工程也不例外。尤其近年來地理資訊系統、營建管理系統及地質鑽孔資料庫的發展，更促使土木工程師正視資料庫的重要性，並學習如何有效地管理龐大的相關資訊。因此，本課程的設計即針對此需要來教導學生熟悉現代資料庫系統的設計與技術，以使他們在畢業後更具有競爭力，更容易找到理想的工作。課程的內容將包括資料處理、概念設計、關連式資料模型、及正規化等領域，而學生必須在學期中設計並完成一個完整的資料庫作為專題計畫。關於本課程的其他細節請見下述課程大綱。
description.en: Database (DB) is an integral part of any information management system, and has been playing a significant role in many academic programs and professions, including the civil engineering, construction engineering, and environmental engineering. In recent years, the development of Geographical Information System, Construction Decision Support System, and Geotechnical Data Bank all require practicing civil engineers to understand the principles of underlying data storage and to develop an effective style of data management to achieve competitiveness in the market place. Therefore, it is the focus of this course to guide the students to become familiar with various technical aspects of modern DB systems so that they can perform the above-mentioned tasks and become more employable. This course will cover areas such as data processing, conceptual DB design, relational data model, and normalization. The students are required to complete a semester project and implement a functional DB.

name.en: Special Topics on Fire Protection Management

description.zh: 本課程主要教授防火管理基本架構，包含燃燒理論，火災特性，防火區劃，防火生活圈，防火計劃與防火管理組織等，並藉由制度化之管理手段技巧教授學生了解防火管理之目的與方法。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on basic concept of fire protection , such as characteristics of fire , district of fire protection , plan and management of fire etc.

description.zh: 本課程針對不同應用主題，諸如人事、財務、物料安全、品質、進度、環保等進行管理科學之介紹，並進行應用研究探討，此外有關作業研究、系統模擬等分析方法亦將於課程中詳加介紹。
description.en: This cause will introduce the management science and application of personnel, finance, safety, material, quality,schedule and environmental protection. Meanwhile,the analysis methods of activity research and system simulation will also be dicussed.

description.zh: 1.概論 2.建築載重及結構反應 3.空間整合與結構系統 4.建築常用之結構系統,含形態成用系統,向量作用系統,面作用系統及體積作用等5.垂直結構系統 6.水平結構系統 7.高樓結構系統 8.基礎結構系統 9.結構系統與建造
description.en: 1.Course introduction 2.Structural loading and structural behaviors 3.Space integration and structural system 4.Popular structural systems 5.Vertical structural system 6.Horizontal structural system 7.High rise building structural system 8.Foundation structual system 9.Structural system and construction

description.zh: 1.X光之本質 2.晶体幾何及倒置晶格3.晶體立體投影 4.X光繞射原理5.X光繞射實驗方法(繞射儀，Laue照相法，粉末法) 6.X光繞射之應用(包括晶體結構之鑑定，晶格常數之量測，相圖測定，序化一非序化轉換及化學成分分析等)
description.en: 1.Properties of X-Ray 2.Crystallography and Reciprocal Lattice 3.Projections of Crystals 4.Principles of X-Ray Diffraction 5.Experimental Methods (Diffractometer Methods, Powder Photographs and Laue Pholtographs)6.Applications of X-ray Diffraction (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal,  Structure of Polycrystalline Aggregates, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

description.zh: 寶石礦物之顏色分類，內含物之特色，光學現象之表現。人造寶石之製造與辨認，均讓學習者有能力鑑定其真偽，價值與市場行為.
description.en: introduction to gem identification

description.zh: 本課程主 要是對生醫玻璃處理技術在理論基礎，方法與應用等方面的講述，以期 培養學生的興趣與專業的知識。課程內容包括生醫玻璃技術的基本理論，處理技術，各種生醫玻璃的製造方法與相關知識，以及各種生醫玻璃技術的應用等項目。
description.en: Bio-glass in the system of Na2O- CaO-Sio2-P2O5 and related glasses are introduces initially in this course. The Bioactive glasses and Glass-ceramic in clinical uses are taught next. The following chapter is covered from bio-glasses and glass-ceramics bond to living bone through layer which is formed on their surfaces in the living body. Blass-ceramics for hyperthermia treatment of cancer and Glasses for radiotherapy of cancer is brief introduced in this course finally.

description.zh: 1.電化學機構─似乾電池，法拉第定律2.腐蝕驅勢和電極電位─Nernst方程式，電位─pH圖3.極化和腐蝕速率─Evans圖4.鈍態理論─氧化膜理論和吸附理論5.防蝕法─陰、陽極防蝕法和抑制劑、鈍態劑防蝕6.八大類濕式腐蝕形態7.高溫腐蝕
description.en: Course Outline：1.Electrochemical Mechanisms─dry cell analogy and Faraday's law2.Corrosion Tendency and Electrode Potentials─Nernst equation, Pourbaix diagrams3.Polarization and Corrosion Rates─Evans diagrams4.Theories of Passivity─oxide film theory and adsorption theory of passivity5.Corrosion Prevention─cathodic and anodic protections, inhibitors, passivators6.Eight forms of Corrosion7.High Temperature Corrosion

description.zh: 介紹高級發光材料及原理
description.en: special topics of luminescent materials

description.zh: 本課程著重於資源再生分選廠的設計與規劃，如何選擇各項機械，並利用電腦程式輔助以達成建廠設計的知識。
description.en: The objective of this class is to teach student how to design a process plant to conduct industrial waste recycling and reutilization.  The process unit selection and computer modeling and simulation will also be included in the design process.

description.zh: 本課程介紹水文地質的一般原理、概念和分析方法及地下水在實用上的一些問題。主要內容有: 水的來、源分、佈與循環、地下水的賦存、地下水的物理性質及化學成分、地下水運動的基本規律、地下的地質作用、地下水的補給、排泄與徑流、地下水資源概況，與地下水有關的環境問題，地下水與工程開發的工程地質問題，水文地質調查概要等。
description.en: The content of this class includes general principles, concepts of hydrological geology and analyzing methods for practical problem related to this subject. It includes: origin of water, distribution and circulation, reserve of underground water, physical and chemical properties of underground water and the relationship between hydrology and engineering geology.  It also discuss environmental concerns of engineering to the hydrology system.

description.zh: 地球自生成以來，其組成與結構一直在改變。今日的岩體即是這種長期改變的結果。地質學是研究岩體組成與結構變化的科學，目的在於掌握這種變化的軌跡，而構造地質學是地質學裡專門研究岩體結構變化的一分科。所謂的岩體結構（即地質構造）是指一個岩體的形狀、尺寸及其內部組成顆粒的排列情形。要了解結構的變化，無論是定性或定量，先要了解岩體的原始結構，從而才能了解現在所觀察到的岩體結構是否發生過變化。雖然構造地質學的目的是由現在既成的結構去了解地球的結構變化，但是就現在地球的結構，我們所能觀察到的岩體結構，大多被植生或土壤所覆蓋，即使偶有露出，也僅是其立體結構的某一表面而已，因此如何利用這些零星有限且是平面的岩體結構去推論地殼整體的結構，是必須首先解決的問題。面對這樣的問題，研究構造地質學應從大處著眼、小處著手，先從了解一個地區某一個露頭的現在結構開始，並由理論及實驗所得的結果推論這個岩體的結構變化過程，再由這些零星露頭的結構及其結構變化過程的資料，去推論、去拼湊涵蓋這些露頭地區的結構，由點而線、由線而面，終而包括整個地殼。本課程為構造地質學的進階課程，主要討論以下之主題：岩石的力學性質與變形行為、應變分
description.en: Structural geology is a branch of earth science. It has developed rapidly over the past decade. The reason for the recent advances in structural geology has been the realization that naturally deformed rocks seen in field outcrops contain a fantastic range of small-scale features which relate directly to large-scale orogenic deformation systems. The other reason has been the realization that rock deformation, like any other form of deformation, obeys well-defined physical and chemical laws. Base on this situation, this course is intended to serve as an accompaniment to techniques-based courses in structural geology or as an accompaniment to the laboratory portion of a postgraduate course. Systematic study of this advanced structural geology course includes several topics: mechanic proporties and deformation behaviors of rocks, strain analysis, ductile geologic structures, brittle geologic structures, and applied structural geology.

description.zh: 本課程依物理處理技術、化學處理技術、生化處理技術以及高溫處理技術等四個方向介紹處理的基本原理與方法。
description.en: This class divide the mineral processing into four categories, i.e., physical process, chemical process, biochemical process, and high temperature process.  The basic principles and processing techniques that can be applied to the mineral processing will be discussed extensively.

description.zh: 探討物質表面之化學結構及性質，相關的理論基礎及技術。
description.en: This course will discuss the basic theories and techniques about the chemical structure and properties of material's surface.

description.zh: 本學科對於再生、非再生資源以及資源再生之現象作一整體性的介紹，並配合原理及實例的講授，以期能對於工商業及一般生活的廢棄物或其附帶產生的低價值物料，經由處理而加以回收利用，避免資源的浪費。
description.en: Introduction the recycle of resources.

name.zh: 材料與結構非破壞檢測
name.en: Non-Destructive Testing of Materials and Structures

description.zh: 課程內容包括：原理探討:超音波,磁場與磁性,電磁感應與渦電流,輻射線,液體表面現象,材料微結構；方法介紹:磁場檢測法,超音波檢測法,渦電流檢測法,X光檢測法,液滲法,微奈米檢測(各種顯微鏡)等；材料非破壞檢測實驗:導電性材料、磁性材料、陶瓷材料、複合材料之缺陷檢測；結構非破壞檢測實驗：機械零件、以及特定結構之檢測；非破壞檢測影像：電腦數據擷取、數據分析、與影像處理
description.en: Introduce the concepts of following topics, Fundamentals: ultrasonic waves, magnetic field and magnetism, electromagnetic induction and eddy currents, X-rays, penetrants. NDT methods: ultrasonic testing, magnetoscopic inspections, eddy current testing, radiographic technique, penetrants method. NDT of materials: conductive materials, magnetic materials, ceramics, composite materials. NDT of structures: mechanical components, specific structures. NDT images: PC-based data acquisition, data analysis and image process.

name.zh: 製造科技特論及實驗(一)
name.en: Special Topics and Experiments of Manufacturing Technology(

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程包括理論與實驗，由製科所教授共同開課。第一學期探討的範圍主要在製造技術，側重在與製造業相關之專業知識。.
description.en: This course includes theories and experiments, is conducted by several professors of institute of manufacturing technology. In first semester, topics covered are mainly in the field of manufacturing technology, emphasizing in professional knowledge of manufacturing industry.

description.zh: 首先對銲接熱源，輸入熱、熱傳導、化學反應、殘留應力生成等與銲接冶金相關的基本起源作一介紹，再以鋁合金、鎳基合金、碳鋼、合金鋼、不銹鋼為例，分別從銲道融溶區、部分融溶區，到熱影響區學習銲接製程導致的冶金現象。主題包括固化組織、晶粒結構、次晶結構、相變態、偏析、固化裂紋、熱裂紋、再加熱裂紋、氫脆、再結晶熱處理性等。
description.en: At the beginning, this course makes an introduction to the related source of weldingheat source, input heat, heat transfer, chemical reaction, residual stress and weldingmetallurgy, moreover, it examplifies aluminum alloy, nickle alloy, carbon steel, alloy steel and stainless steel to describe metallurgical phenomenon from weld fusion zone and partial fusion zone to the welding process which is influenced byheat energy. Its main subjects include solidification, crystal structure, second particle structure, phase deformation, segregation, solidified cracks, hot check, reheat check,hydrogen embrittlement, recrystallization, heat treatment property, etc..

description.zh: 寶石業為台灣新興的工業之一，集地質學、礦物學、結晶學、切割技術、商業行為及藝術美感於此門學問，寶石礦物的物理及化學性質和鑑定，寶石礦物的生成和產狀及其地理公布，如何加工，銷售行為如何進行，珠寶的設計方式及製造。寶石礦物之顏色分類，內含物之特色，光學現象之表現。人造寶石之製造與辨認，均讓學習者有能力鑑定其真偽，價值與市場行為。
description.en: Introduction the physics and chemistry properties of gemstones.

description.zh: 炸藥與爆破工程應用於岩石爆破，為採礦及大地工程的基本作業。本課程之目的在介紹炸藥性質、炸藥反應原理、爆材特性及應用、爆破設計及施工並兼及爆破作業之環境控制。
description.en: The blasting engineering course focuses on the introduction of explosives and their properties and characteristics, explosives and blasting theories, drilling and blasting design and operations, and environemtnal control of blasting.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 1.數學基礎  1.1函數成長率之漸近性質  1.2遞回關係之解  1.3數學歸納法2.基本分析技巧  2.1計算複雜度之上下限  2.2最差情況分析及平均情況分析2.3動態平均分析  3.基本設計技巧  3.1分擊法  3.2貪婪法  3.3動態規則3.4隨機演算法  4.計算複雜度  4.1資訊理論證明法  4.2對抗式證明法4.3問題之線性轉換  4.4完全NP
description.en: 1.Mathematical background  1.1Asymptotic growth rate of functions  1.2Solving recurrence relations  1.3Mathematical induction  2.Basic analysis techniques  2.1    Computational complexities -lower bounds and upper bounds  2.2Worst case analysis and average case analysis  2.3Amortized analysis  3.Basic Design Paradigms   3.1Divide and conquer  3.2Greedy methods   3.3Dynamic Programming  3.4 Probabilistic algorithms  4.Computational Complexity 4.1Information-theoretic arguments  4.2Adversary arguments   4.3Linear reduction of problems  4.4NP-completeness

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式3. 形狀函數及等參數元素4. 一維問題:桿、桁架、樑及骨架等5. 二維問題:平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題:一般實體7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。     1.分子動力學模式的建立  2.基本守恆律與週期性邊界  3.硬球模式  4.分子動力之差分邏輯  5.軟球模式  6.靜態性質  7.內能、壓力、均方根力、比熱、熵  8.軸向分佈函數  9.動態性質  10.時間相關函數  11.愛因斯坦關係式  12.格林-克伯關係式  13.擴散係數  14.黏性係數  15.動態結構（空間-時間相關係數）
description.en: 1.	Establishment of the Molecular Dynamic models 2.Conservative systems and periodic boundary conditions  3.Hard sphere model  4.Algorithms for Molecular Dynamics  5.Soft sphere model  6.Static Properties  7.Internal Energy, Pressure Mean Square for 4, specific heat, Entropy  8.Redial distribution Function  9.Dynamics Properties  10.Time Correlation Function  11.Einstein Relation  12.Green-Kubo Relation  13.Diffusiaity 14.Viscosity  15.Dynamic Structure(Space-Time Correlation)

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

name.en: Advanced Integrated Circuit Fabrication Process and Lab.

description.zh: 前段製程：包含物理沈積、化學沈積、微影、蝕刻等製程。深入探討最新的製程技術及研究方向。後段製程：包含各種IC封裝的技術及測試方法、並深入探討最新的研究方向。
description.en: Review of the basic IC fabrication Process, Study the state of art of the Fabrication Process, especially about technology and facilities. Including PVD, CVD, doping heat process.

description.zh: 精確度、重覆性、精密度及解析度等、彈性變形及動態特性、背隙摩擦及動態特性、系統補償、精密機構及動態分析。
description.en: Accuracy, Repeatability, Precision and Resolution; Elastic Deformation, Backlash, Friction and their Dynamic Properties; System Compensation; precision Mechanisms and Dynamic Analysis.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意.類神經網路介紹: 演算法,應用,與程式技巧，類神經網路控制器設計與模擬，模糊集合,近似推理理論,模糊邏輯控制器介紹，模糊邏輯控制器設計與模擬，基因演算法介紹，以基因演算法最佳化控制器，智慧型控制應用。
description.en: 1.Introduction to neural network: algorithms, applications, programming techniques. 2. Design and simulation of neural network controller3. Introduction to fuzzy set, approximate reasoning, fuzzy logic controller4. Design and simulation of fuzzy logic controller5. Introduction to genetic algorithm6. Optimization of controller by genetic algorithm7. Applications of intelligent controller

description.zh: 先修課程：日文﹙一﹚或具備日文基礎片假名及平假名讀寫複習，問候語.簡單單字.字組詞語說明， 基楚日本語文法，公司及個人自我介紹，科技日語閱讀技巧解說，日文技術資料查尋及研讀，科技外來語及說明書講解與閱讀，技術用語及機械專業用日本語。
description.en: HIRAGANA and KATAKANA, Greeting sentences, Basic grammar and structure,  Introduce yourself and your company, Study technology Japanese, Read Japanese  guide book and illustrations, High-Techjapanese and mechanical Japanese.

name.zh: 自動化機構設計與實習

description.zh: 自動化機構運動及動力分析、控制理論與氣液壓學簡介、機構元件說明、馬達及感測器選用、實驗器材介紹、機構選用實例及實習。
description.en: Kinematic and dynamic Analysis of automatic mechanisms, Control theorem, Introduction to pneumatics and Hydraulics,Mechanism elements, Selection of motors and sensors,        Introduction to Lab. Instruments, Examples and Lab's of mechanism selection.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。人工智慧概論、LISP或Prolog程式語言介紹、搜尋策略、述語邏輯、邏輯知識之解析、專家系統、類神經網路、模糊理論、個案研究及程式練習。
description.en: Introduction of Artificial Intelligence, Introduction of LISP & Prolog, Stratage of Searching, The Analyses of Logic Knowledge, Expert System, Neuro Network, Fuzzy Theory, Case Study & Practice.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。變分微積分與最佳化之關係及其在工程最佳化上之應用、端點條件、不連續最佳化程序、無限制及有限制條件最佳化問題、直接法及實際最佳化設計應用等。
description.en: Introduction of Variational Calculus and its Application in the Engineering Optimal Design, Constrained/Unconstrained Optimal Design Problems, Discrete Optimal Control and Mathematical Programming, Practical Examples of Optimum Design.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。自動化機械設計簡介、自動化機械設計程序、驅動器、感測器、基礎電器控制及電工配線、基礎數位電路設計、氣液壓及電控迴路的邏輯設計法、可程式控制器、監控系統、自動化系統的規劃及評估。
description.en: Automation System Planning & Evaluation, The Process of Automatic Machinery Design, Basic Electric Control & Wiring Basic, Basic Electric Circuit Design, Application of Logic Design method on Pneumatic/ Hydraulic & Electric Circuit, Application of PLC and Industrial Robots, Case Study.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。變分法（ Weighted Residual法、Rayleih-Ritz 法等）、一維、二維及三維常用有限元素模型推演、介紹、元素內插(Interpolation)、積分、元素及總體矩陣、收歛及誤差、特徵值等、有限元素法於工程上之應用 (線性固態及結構問題為例)、商用軟體介紹。
description.en: Weighted Residual Method, Rayleigh-Ritz Method, Constant Strain Elements, Plane Strain and Stress Elemental and Global Matrix Formation, Convergence and Error, Eigenvalue Problems, Application to Engineering (Solid Mechanics and Structural Systems), and Commercial Packages.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。熔接概念、熔接方法介紹、各種熔接特性、熔銲人員資格及熔接檢驗、熔接控制及熔接規範(WPS)。
description.en: Introduction of Welding Codes, Fundamentals of Welding, Welding Processes, Welding Equipment, Metals and Their Weldability, Evaluation of Welds, Welding Procedure Specifications (WPS) and Qualification.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。自動化機械設計簡介、自動化機械設計程序、驅動器、感測器、基礎電器控制及電工配線、基礎數位電路設計、氣液壓及電控迴路的邏輯設計法、可程式控制器、監控系統、自動化系統的規劃及評估。
description.en: Automation System Planning & Evaluation, The Process of Automatic Machinery Design, Basic Electric Control & Wiring Basic, Basic Electric Circuit Design, Application of Logic Design method on Pneumatic/ Hydraulic & Electric Circuit, Application of PLC and Industrial Robots, Case Study.

name.en: Introduction to Electromagnetism and its Applications

description.zh: 1.	電學: 電力線,電位場,庫侖力,電阻率,電流分佈,超導電性,尖端放電,電偶極,極     化,介電性,介電材料,壓電性,壓電材料,掃描式與穿隧式電子顯微鏡,電場屏蔽。2.	磁學: 電流磁效應,磁力線,帶電粒子之運動,霍耳效應,高斯計,質譜儀,磁偶極,磁     滯,磁性材料,磁路設計,超導材料與元件,核磁共振成像,磁場屏蔽。3.	電磁場與電磁波：電磁感應,渦電流,電磁波,偏極化,反射與折射,波導管,微波濾波器, 天線,無線通訊,電磁屏蔽。
description.en: 3.	電磁場與電磁波：電磁感應,渦電流,電磁波,偏極化,反射與折射,波導管,微波濾波器, 天線,無線通訊,電磁屏蔽。  1. Electricity:     Electric field, potential, Coulomb force, Resistivity, current, superconductivity, point discharge, electric dipole, electric polarization, dielectric, dielectric materials, piezoelectricity, piezoelectric materials, scanning electron microscope and scanning tunneling microscope  (SEM & STM), electrostatic shielding.  2. Magnetics:     Biot-Savart Law, magnetic flux, motion of a charged particle in magnetic field, Hall effect, Gauss meter, Mass spectrometer, magnetic dipole, Hysteresis, magnetic materials, magnetic circuit, superconducting materials and devices, nuclear magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), magnetic shielding.  3. Electromagnetic fields and waves    Electromagnetic induction, eddy currents, electromagnetic waves, polarization, reflection and refraction, wave guides, microwave filters, antenna, wireless communications, electromagneti

description.zh: 先修課程：3002012及3002015或負責教授同意。以單元實例說明機械設計之過程:設計理念、設計方法、設計步驟(物料及材質選用、元件設計、製造控制、及設計整合等)、品質與設計問題發生與破解實例、專題研究。
description.en: Study of Machine Design by Example Units: Design Concepts & Methodology, Design Approaches (Material Selection, Element Design, Manufacturing Control and Integral Design), Quality and Design Function, Theoretical Study in Designed Examples.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。專利權認識與管理，著作權認識與保護，商標權認識與管理，營業秘密與競業禁止，電子商務認識與運用。
description.en: Introduction and management of Patent, Introduction and protection of Copyright, Introduction and management of Trademark, Trade Secret and Competitive business forbidden, Introduction and application of e-commerce.

description.zh: 本課程針包含基本的生理信號的簡介，並介紹各種目前應用於醫療上之儀器的基本原理。
description.en: The course includes a brief introduction of the basics of medical physiology, and followed by the introduction of the fundamental principles of operation, applications and design of the medical instruments most commonly used in hospitals.

name.zh: 數位信號處理器應用技術
name.en: Applied Technology of Digital Signal Processor

description.zh: 數位信號處理簡介，DSP架構簡介(以德儀的TMS320C系列為基礎)， DSP作伺服馬達及運動控制之應用與實習。
description.en: Introduction of Digital Signal Processing, Architecture of DSP (based on TMS320 family of Texas Instruments ), Laboratory of servo motor and motion control using DSP

description.zh: 各種感測器之量測原理，訊號處理的一般方法（濾波、放大電路等），類比/數位轉換器之原理、規格與結構，RS-232之通訊測試自動量測設備與GPIB標準界面，小型電腦輔助測試系統之建構與使用
description.en: Measurement Principles of a Variety of Sensors,General Methods for Signal Processing (Filter, Amplified Circuits,etc.)Principle, Specification and Structure of A/D Converter,Automatic Test Equipment and GPIB Standard Interface Bus,Implementation and Use of Small Computer-Aided-Test-Systems.

name.zh: 物件導向程式設計與應用

description.zh: 1.物件導向程式設計特性介紹 2.視窗圖形界面設計 3. SQL語言的使用與資料庫連結 4.智慧型演算法 5.工程實例應用
description.en: 1.An introduction to object-oriented design 2.Windows GUI design 3.SQL and Database connection programming 4.Intelligent Algorithms 5. Applications of engineering problems

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識即時電腦控制系統，瞭解其系統架構，並學習即時電腦控制系統之軟體設計技術。內容包含： (1)即時控制系統介紹， (2)電腦控制， (3)即時控制系統之硬體需求， (4)電腦控制實現， (5)作業系統， (6)即時控制系統設計， (7)即時控制系統性能分析。
description.en: This course let students to understand the real-time computer control system and learn the skill to design the software of real-time computer control system.  The contents of this course are: (1)Real-time Computer Control System Introduction, (2)Concept of Computer Control, (3)Computer Hardware Requirement for Real-time Computer Control System, (4) Computer Control Implementation, (5)Operating Systems (6)Real-time Computer Control System Design, (7)Real-time Computer Control System Performance Analysis.

name.zh: 物件導向程式設計與應用

description.zh: 1.物件導向程式設計特性介紹 2.視窗圖形界面設計 3.視窗I/O界面設計 4. SQL語言的使用與資料庫連結 5.網路程式設計 6.實例應用
description.en: 1.An introduction to object-oriented design 2.Windows GUI design 3.Windows Input/Output Interface programming 4. SQL and Database connection programming 5.Network programming 6. Case study

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生對中國傳統文化所孕育的建築表現，使學生認識傳統的文化涵構與建築之關係及其構造方法，其主要授課內容如下：1.思想及文化背景：以周易及禮制為起點，以至儒道二家思想，引申至象徵主義或文字學等對建築之影響。2.類型討論：探討住宅、宮殿、寺廟、衙門、城、橋、塔、墳等設計思想與原則。3.建築主題：瞭解建築平面發展之原理、立面設計與台觀處理之原則及象徵主義思想對平面規劃、布局及立面裝修之影響。4.園林建築：以江南園林及北方大型園林為例，探討其布局、園屋、疊山、理水等相關規劃原則。5.建築構造：瞭解土木構造的基本設計原則與構造方法，進而討論裝修彩畫等細部特徵。
description.en: It is an introductory course to history of Chinese architecture. The purpose is to raising students' awareness of traditional culture for further concern of our environment. It will focus on the following themes:(1) Thought and Culture. (2) Architectural type. (3) Architectural characters. (4) Garden architecture. (5) Structure and Construction.

description.zh: 污水工程主要講授管線收集系統及污水處理系統二大部分管理系統，分為雨水及污水收集系統，舉凡水量、水質之估算及管線之施工等，皆為授課範圍。污水處理的方法講授：(1)物理方法，如攔污柵、沈砂、沈澱池、(2)生物方法，如活性污泥法、過濾池等、(3)化學方法，如混凝、化學沈澱等，處理方法講授原理及應用，設計準則與工程設計施工。
description.en: Sewerage system includes sanitary sewerage and storm water sewer systems. Their planning, design, and construction method methods are all included in this study. Wastewater treatment is also emphasized in this course.

description.zh: 本課程以計算力學之理論為經，結構分析之方法為緯，教導修習學生將結構學之基本觀念徹底融通。其內容主要在說明變分原理，應用於結構分析之原理及方法，並介紹計算力學與古典力學應用於結構分析之差別及優點，使學生能對結構力學有更深刻的瞭解。
description.en: Fundamental theory of statically indeterminate structures; analysis of indeterminate beams, frames, and trusses by stiffness and flexibility methods; study of influence lines for beams, frames, and trusses.

description.zh: 從基本的生醫紡織品，如︰縫合線，人工血管，人工腎臟到人造肌膚等，說明其組成，製程，功能以及對生體的作用，另外人體對生醫材料之包容性，分解性，致癌性，毒性等詳細說明和比較。
description.en: Biomedical Textiles, is an introductory course designed for biomaterial compositions, manufacture, functionality and implantability.  Biomaterials included in the course are sutures, vascular grafts, artificial organs, artificial tissues,etc.  In addition, biocompatibility, biodegradability, carcinogenicity and toxicity of biomaterials are presented and compared in detail.

description.zh: 此課程之目標是講授生物化學原理，包含生物分子構形、代謝能源之製造與儲存，生物大分子之合成，基因訊息，人類生化之觀點。
description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce the principle of biochemistry, including biomolecular conformation, generation and storage of metabolic energy, biosynthesis of macromolecular precursors, genetic information, some aspects of human biochemistry.

description.zh: 講述有關低溫電漿的特徵、性能及有機高分子纖維、生醫素材方面的應用。因高分子表面的改質，使濕潤性、接著性、染色性、帶電性、印刷性等獲致改善，附與高機能功能性。並針對處理時的條件，包括氣體的種類、真空度、壓力、功率、時間、流量等因素，探討對高分子素材表面改質的影響和效果。配合SEM、ESCA、接觸角等儀器的分析、觀測高分子表面構造的變化及成分的變異，以研究高分子表面的改質。
description.en: Lecture for the characteristic of low temperature plasma. as  well as its application in organic polymer fiber and biomedical material. The submicron modification of polymer surface can improve wettibility, adhesion, dyeing behavior, electrification, and printing properties for endow material with high performance. Explain for the plasma treating conditions, such as gas  variety、vacuum、 pressure、power、 time、 flow rate etc., are also discussed in order to study their influence and effect in Polymer Material surface modification. The surface structure and component change are analyzed by SEM, ESCA and contact angle instruments to investigate the modification on polymer surface.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 隨著人類對於工程技術的省思，以及環境倫理的變遷，兼顧生態、安全、景觀等面向生態工法逐漸受到重視。我國自2002年起，全力推動生態工法的落實及應用上的困難。有鑑於此，特開立「生態工法概論」，建立全盤性的了解，使土木工程能迎合時代的需求，提升相關智識水準。因此，將分別就基本精神、案例、應用範疇等議題進行探討。
description.en: This is intended as brief introduction to the subject of Ecological Engineering Methods(EEM), which is a whole new concept in the field of civil engineering. The Advantages of EEM is not only to satisfy the demand of safety(i.e. natural hazards control)but also that of protecting ecosystem and landscape aesthetic. In 2002, related government agencies try to pormote the application of EEM , and attempt to adopt this specific measure. However, the lack of basic understanding and knowledge has been the main reason why engineers are struggling in introducing EEM into reality. Therefore, including fundamental theories, cases study, and practical apects of application will be taught in this course. The optimal goal is to inspire students to learn more about new philosopgy and techniques in the world of civil engineering.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在於使學生了解，要想做一個優良的教師，必須知道先要充實自己，除了不斷的充實專門的知識和技能以外，應多學習些教育的理論和方法，試著利用理論以指導經驗，並從實際經驗中去驗證理論。一個剛從學校畢業出來的教師，要儘量利用教育專業的知識和技能，努力學習做好教學的工作。例如要知道如何去組織、分析、調整、和補充教材，如何去設計教學活動，如何練習活用教法及教學技術，如何提高學生的學習興趣，如何養成學生之良好的學習習慣，如何加強常規的訓練和教室的管理，如何和諧教室的氣氛，和何進行教學的評鑑等，都是教師應當研究改進的重要課題。在實際工作中去尋求學理的根據;並以理論去指導工作的進行，如此日就月將，自會增進教學的效果。本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標：1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。2-1具備課程與教學設計能力。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了
description.en: The purpose of this class is to make students understand how to be a good teacher. There are following conditions: (a) totally know the every detail of this course. (b) have good teaching theory and method (c) know how to make the curriculum better.(d) how to design teaching activity (e) how to use the teaching method and technique (f) how to motivate students (g) how to let students have good learning hobby (h) how to increase the training and class management ( i ) how to keep the atmosphere well in classroom.

description.zh: 考試在教學上所扮演的角色一直是大家所關心的課題，良好的試題不但可以測出學生真正的能力同時，也可為教學的本身帶來正面的影響;相反的，不適當的試題，不能測出學生的能力不說，往往還會誤導了教學的方向。因此，對教師而言，測量與評鑑方面的能力是非常重要的。本課程針對技職教師之特殊需要，介紹下列幾項重點; (一)測量與評鑑的基本觀念，(二)三個學習領域的內容與測量方式，(三)常模參照測驗與效標參照測驗的試題分析與評鑑，(四)可用於技職教育的標準化測驗，(五)技職教育評鑑的理論與實施，及(六)畢業生及僱主的追蹤調查。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標：1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: Examinations play a very important role in teaching process. A good examination can not only test the ability of students but also have a good influence to teaching. In another way, a bad examination will mislead the way of teaching.

description.zh: 在目前資訊爆增的社會中，從事教學工作確實不是一件很輕鬆的工作。當今國內的教育方式是大量的資訊必須利用有限的時間，在指定的空間內，傳播給必須接受者。此一工作勢必要借助於相當妥善的媒介或手段才能做到。因此，從事教育工作者如何研究和運用適切的媒體來教學已成為不可忽視的課題。本課程的重點在介紹教學媒體的涵義、分類與功能、如何進行教學傳播，以及媒體教學的基本理論。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 2-1具備課程與教學設計能力。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The purpose of this course is to let students understand how to make teaching material for every different course. The contents of this course include how to make transparency, slide, and video tape. Furthermore, MS Office PowerPoint will be introduced in this class.

description.zh: 本課程的目標是訓練有志教學工作的學生，使其能熟悉學科課程標準，準備分析及運用教材，練習教案的編製與運用，練習靈活運用教學法，教學技術，熟知學校常規，設計與指定作業以及練習教學評鑑與學習評量，使從參與行動中接觸各種實際經驗，以便畢業後能須利適應教學情境。
description.en: The object of this course is to lead the students to know how to be a good instructor with good instructional methods and skills learned from this course. For achieving this goal, this course presents the students with basic theories of instructions, makes them study from demonstration in high school and among themselves, directs them to practices the making of inst4ucting plans. After finishing this course, the students should have learned how to make sure of the standard of the subjects they are going to teach; how to prepare, analyze and skillfully use the teaching material, how to make and skillfully use the instructing plans, how to actively use instructing methods and skills, how to will know and use the school or class rules, how to design and assign exercise, how to evaluate instruction and learning. As a result, they must become good teachers in the future.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在於使有志從事教育工作的學生了解如何針對不同的科目做適切性的課程設計。 課程設計的努力必須符合知性且令人信服的品質標準，而此種標準需植基於人類學習領域的科學研究及理論。在確定每一設計步驟的學習目標時，教學設計的方法都要加以考量。準此觀點，無論如何，仍要考慮其他的因素。設計者最後要處理印刷、圖片及聲音等細節，而這些元素都有自已的技術課程計者只要遵照本課程的原則必能設計出符合堅實研究及理論基礎的課程。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to make students understand how to design different curriculum for every different course. The designer have to totally understand the needs of this course and know the detail of every technique. A good designer is the basis of  successful teacher.

description.zh: 本課程目標在於提供學生規劃與管理-學校工場的知識與技能，冀望學過同學能處理學校工場相關問題。內容包括工場佈置原則、空間規劃、造形、採光、通風、噪音防制、色彩、輔助室、場房設備、工具機器、材料、人事管理、工場安全與衛生、實例探討。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to offer the students all the knowledge and skills of planning and managing a school shop. It is our expectation that all students who have taken this course are able to handle the related techniques in a school shop. The contents include planning principles, space allocation, shop shapes, lighting, ventilation, noise protection, colors, assistance rooms, shop facilities, machine tools, material, personnel management, safty and hygiene. examples will be provided.

description.zh: 由計畫、組織、領導、溝通、評鑑等理念探討教育行政學，並瞭解我國教育行政機關及一般學校行政運作模式，以為未來從事教職或擔任教育行政工作之準備。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標：1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。4-2具備展現協作與領導之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: Form planning, organization, leadership, communication, and evaluation to discuss education administration. Students will understand the system of school administration and know how it works.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生一個簡潔、廣泛又清楚的教育研究法架構，課程包括三大部份，第一部份探討教育研究計畫的準備及撰擬；第二部份探討主要的教育研究方法；第三部份探討教育研究資料分析與解釋。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to make a brief introduction about research methods in education. The contents include three major part: (1) how to prepare the topic of the research (2) how to choice the suitable research method (3) how to analyse the data.

description.zh: 本課程之目的，是使欲擔任技職科目之教師，瞭解教材編製原理及實務，並將所學習之教材編製原理、實務編製一套教材。欲達到課程之目標，課程內容包含教學明細計畫、教育哲學陳述、課程目標概念、教學分析、教學程序概念、各種教學單、相關知識分析、教學管理及活動計畫等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to make students understand how to make a program for  a technical course. The contents include(a) detail teaching plan (b) the statement of philosophy (c) the idea of course purpose (d) teaching activity analysis (e) teaching procedure idea (f) teaching assistance sheet (g) related knowledge analysis (h) teaching administration (I) activity planning.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在培養學生瞭解教育與社會關係，從而能自教育的社會基礎理論觀點來從事教育決策，分析教育制度，探求教學原則，解決教育問題。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。1-2具備領域/學科知識及相關教學知能。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The object of this course is to introduce the students the understanding of the relationship between education and society. It presents the students with the relation between education and the main sociological theories, such as socialization, social structure, social change. It also offer students with the social condition of schools, the teacher*s role, the teacher groups and the teacher*s social status. After finishing this course, the students can use the knowledge learned from this course to make educational decision, analyze educational systems, study the instructional principles and solve educational problems in view of the basic theories of sociology of education, and thus lead to achieve the educational goal.

description.zh: 本課程目標旨在提供學習者具有特殊教育概念，使能激起原有動機，願意獻身予特殊教育學生。本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。2-1具備課程與教學設計能力。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。3-1具備發揮班級經營效能營造支持性學習環境之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: Introduction to the field of special education, and arouse learners' original motivation devoted to special needs students.

description.zh: 面臨我國高齡化社會的趨勢下，老人與環境的議題急待重視。在觀察老人與環境互動的過程中，需將老人的生活空間經驗置入於生活變遷、社會關係及文化脈絡的向度中來討論。本課程是綜合心理學、心理學、社會學、建築與都市規劃等多面向學科來探討老人的身心特性及老年生活環境之需求。
description.en: Facing a trend toward the aging society, the issue about the elderly and environment is supposed to be valued. In view of the process of the elderly and environment interaction , this research puts the living space experience of Taiwan elderly into the living transition, social relation and culture context for sector consideration. It is a complexity course integrated with Psychology, Physiology, Sociology, Architecture and Urban planning in order to study the characters of physiological and psychological of the elderly and the need of living environment.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是提供學生對於都市政策規劃、都市設計與方案實施等有關專業領域更深入研究之機會。專題多元而深入，諸如以下之專題皆可作為討論之主題：1.	地方發展計畫、與管理之理論與實務2.	資源規劃與管理3.	環境倫理4.	交通政策與規劃5.	土地使用規劃6.	公共設施建設7.	國外規劃比較8.	住宅政策9.	鄉村規劃10.	景觀規劃11.	綠社區12.	敷地與不動產開發管理13.	都市理論研究14.	當代規劃設計思潮與評論
description.en: The aim of the course is to provide an opportunity for in-depth study of urban specialized areas related to policy -making, urban planning and design, and implementation professional studies. The following topic areas will be offered as options for study:1.	Theories and practices in local planning, development and management2.	Resource planning and management3.	Environmental ethics4.	Transport policy and planning5.	Land use planning 6.	Public facilities construction7.	Comparative Overseas Planning8.	Housing Policy9.	Countryside Planning10.	Landscape Planning11.	Green communities12.	Site and property development13.	Urban theory research14.	Contemporary thought and commentary on planning and design

description.zh: 邀請各界人士到系演講，針對學術專題研究成果進行研討，並就管理技術與發展趨勢以及成功個案等介紹不同行業的營運方式及競爭力分析。
description.en: Scholars and experts will be invited to make lectures; each lecture will focus on special attribution in the field which speaker involved.

description.zh: 有關建築歷史、理論、批評、構造、營建管理等相關主題討論。
description.en: A theme topic discussion on the field of architecture history, theory, criticism, structure, construction and management, etc.

description.zh: 一、 本課程目的在使同學認識與了解台灣傳統建築歷史、文化、技術之精髓所在，進而增進建築設計運用傳統建築思想與素材之能力。二、 講述內容包括台灣史前、原住民、荷西、明鄭、清代與近現代等建築之形成與型態變遷過程。三、 講述方式以幻燈片介紹為主，學期中並安排兩次實地參訪。
description.en: 1. This course is based on the belief that： to recognized and understanding of the historical 、culture and technique in the Taiwan Traditional Architecture. 2. The scope of the course are include the styles and changes in prehistorically period, aboriginal, Dutch colonialist, Ch'ing Dynasty and contemporary Taiwan Traditional Architecture. 3. The methods of the course are slides shows and to visit the historical sites

description.zh: 介紹照明相關知識以及各類型建築物、戶外景觀之照明，使能應用於建築與景觀之規劃設計。課程內容包括：照明基本原理、光源 、照明燈具 、照明計算、照明設計基礎、住宅照明、辦公室照明 、學校照明 、工廠照明、商業店舖照明、美術館、博物館照明、建築物夜景照明、運動場照明、公園廣場照明、庭園照明。
description.en: The course is introduce lighting knowledge and lighting technique of each building types and outdoor landscape lighting. There are including the basic of lighting, lighting source, luminaire, lighting calculation, the basic of lighting design, house lighting, office lighting, school lighting, factory lighting, commercial and shop lighting, museum lighting, nightscape of building, sport lighting, park and square lighting, garden lighting.

name.zh: 數位超大型積體電路設計與佈局

description.zh: CMOS電路簡介、金氧半電晶體理論、金氧半製程技術、電路特性分析、電路功能評估、CMOS電路與邏輯設計、CMOS設計方法、CMOS測試、CMOS次系統設計及CMOS案例討論等。
description.en: Introduction to CMOS Circuit, MOS Transistor Theory, CMOS Technology, Circuit Characterization, Performance Estimation, CMOS circuit and Logic Design, CMOS Design Methods, CMOS Testing, CMOS Subsystem Design,  and CMOS Case Studies.   （已有）

description.zh: 半導體開關在電力電子電路之作用，波形失真與諧波分析,DC-DC轉換器，AC-DC轉換器，DC-AC轉換器。
description.en: 1.power semiconductor switches. 2.waveform distortion  & harmonic analysis. 3.DC-DC converter. 4.AC-DC converter. 5.DC-AC converter.

description.zh: 1.晶體結構與晶體生長 2.載體濃度與能階圖 3.載體傳輸,擴散,漂移4.半導體的光電特性 5.pn接面分析
description.en: 1.crystal structures & crystal growth 2.energy-band diagrams& carrier densities 3.carrier transport 4.optoelectronicproperties of semiconductors 5.pn junctions

description.zh: 1.雙極性電晶體 2.蕭特基接面 3.MOS結構 4.MOSFETS 5.CMOS電路及製程 6.各種IC技術
description.en: 1.bipolar junction transfors 2.metal-semiconductor junctions3.MOS structors 4.MOSFETS 5.CMOS circuits & processes 6.ICfabrication technologies

description.zh: 本課程內容包括氣體分離、滲透蒸發、離子交換膜分離、液膜分離、逆滲透及超過濾等薄膜分離程序。
description.en: Membrane separation processes including gas separation, pervaporation, ion exchange membrane, liquid membrane, reverse osmosis, and ultrafiltration.

description.zh: 為使學生對高分子物理有所認識，本課程之設定將涵蓋所有高分子物理之相關課題，其主要內容分以下兩大部份(I)高分子之非結晶性質(II)高分子之結晶性質。而兩大部份中，又各分以下數單元講述:(I) 高分子之非結晶性質(a) 高分子鏈之機率結構(b) 分子鏈之運動方式(c) 高分子熱力學(d) 自由體積理論(含Tg ,Tα,Tβ,Tγ之探討)(e) WLF經通曲線(II)高分子之結晶性質(a) 結晶晶格之分析(b) 高分子結晶度及順向度之估計(c) 結晶度對高分子機械性質，導電性質，及熱性質之影響(d) 溶液晶體與熔融晶體之比較(e) 熱結晶及張力結晶之比較
description.en: This course is designed to make students theroughly understand the problems related to polymer physics. The main content will include two major topics:(I)Amorphous Polymer(II)Crystalline Polymer.The detailed items included in the course are:(I) Amorphous Polymer (a) Random-Walk Theory for Chain Configuration(b) Chain Conformation and Movements(c) Polymer Thermodynamics(d) Free Volume Theory (including the study on Tg ,Tα,Tβ,Tγ…etc.)(e) WLF Master Curve(II)Crystalline Polymer(a) Unit Cell Analysis(b) Polymer Crystallinity and Orientation Measurement(c) Effect of Crystallinity on Mechanical, Dielectrical, and Thermal Properties of Polymeric Materials (d) Solution Crystals vs. Melt Crystals(e) Thermal Induced Nucleation vs. Stress Induced Nucleation.

description.zh: 以環境工程之角度，溶入工程實務觀念，介紹基本微生物等，包括微生物特性與分類、微生物檢驗、新陳代謝及生長死亡之模式。並輔以應用性之課程如水文處理微生物，期使學生了解環境工程上基本微生物之原理。
description.en: "Microbiology for Environmental Engineering"is a course to introduce the comprehensive microbiology applied to general environmental engineering.The contented of course consists of characteristic and identification of organisms,nutrition and growth conchitions,metabolism(anabolism and catabolism),microorganisms for water supply,sewerage treatment,waste landfill and soil contamination.

description.zh: 建議先修課程：流體力學模型理論、管流理論、渠流理論、渠變理論、計算流體力學、數值理論
description.en: Prerequisite(suggested) : Fluid mechanics, HydrologyIntroduction, Model similitude, Pipe flow, Open channel flow, Gradually varied flow (Backwater computation ...), Unsteady flow, Computational fluid mechanics (ex: FDM, FEM)

description.zh: 由於世界各國對自來水水質標準逐漸提高，因此，自來水高級處理已變成目前國際上飲用水研究之主要趨勢。此外在台灣，由於河川受污水下水道普及率低及工業污染之影響下，原水水質長久不佳。傳統處理程序已無法因應消費者之需求，高雄水質不佳即是最好例子。因此，本課程之重點嘉集中高級自來水之處理程序，如薄膜逆滲透、超過濾、為過濾、臭氧等高級氧化程序與有機物吸附等處理程序。
description.en: Because of the tightened regulation enacted by many countries, advanced drinking water treatment technology has been the research focus all around the world. In addition, in Taiwan, water resource, including surface and ground water, are seriously polluted due to industrial discharge and low sewerage system connection ratio. Traditional treatment processes, such as coagulation, sedimentation, filtration, are not enough for water purification for these deterioraated raw water gualities. Therefoore, this class will offer the opportunity to improve the knowledge for advanced drinking water treatment technology, including reverse osmosis, nanofiltration, ozone disinfection, GAC adsorption, and me.

description.zh: 妥善地利用資源可促使資源生生不息，不當地濫用卻會帶來大地反撲，禍及人類，如何在建設的同時，大興土木之際，顧及生態體系，乃為本課程之主要重點。課程內容包括環境生態系統、生態學之基本法則、質能傳遞、污染物對生態之影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to learn how to use the natural sources for industrial development but also maintain the ecological balance. Improper usage of natural resources will bring adverse results. The topic will include: fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

description.zh: 本課程探討外語習得理論及應用語言學中與外語教學領域最為相關的課題。本課程研討的主要內容包括：（一）第一語言習得；（二）第二語言和外語習得；（三）第一語言習得與外語習得的比較；（四）語言學習策略與學習類型；（五）動機態度等情緒因素和外語學習的關係；（六）外語學習的社會文化因素；（七）話語分析；（八）對比分析與錯誤分析；（九）語言交際溝通能力；（十）外語習得理論；（十一）語言與社會文化；（十二）語言與閱讀教學；（十三）語言與寫作教學；（十四）全語言教學哲學。
description.en: This course familiarizes students with major second language acquisition theories and with those aspects of applied linguistics that are most relevant to second/foreign language learning and teaching.   The topics that this course primarily deals with include the following: (1) first language acquisition; (2) second language acquisition; (3) comparing and contrasting first and second language acquisition; (4) learning styles and learner strategies; (5) affect in second language learning; (6) sociocultural factors in second language learning; (7) discourse analysis; (8) contrastive analysis, interlanguage, and error analysis; (9) communicative competence; (10) theories of second language acquisition; (11) language and culture; (12) language and the reading process; (13) language and the writing process; (14) the whole language philosophy.

description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.
